DA_ItemType_Questitem_HeklaKey.name: Hekla's Key
DA_ItemType_Questitem_HeklaKey.description: The key to Jina and Hekla's tent.

DA_ItemType_Creature_Ormu.name: Ormu
DA_ItemType_Creature_Ormu.description: A domesticated animal used to produce milk.

DA_ItemType_Creature_Piqni.name: Piqni
DA_ItemType_Creature_Piqni.description: A female Piqni. Produces eggs daily when fed.

DA_ItemType_OrmuPen.name: Ormuu Pen
DA_ItemType_OrmuPen.description: A pen for these loveable creatures.

DA_ItemType_Bait_None.name: No Bait
DA_ItemType_Bait_None.description: Fish without bait attached. You'll only catch very basic fish.

DA_ItemType_DisplacerBeast_Medal.name: Displacer Beast Medal
DA_ItemType_DisplacerBeast_Medal.description: A medal given for defeating a Displacer Beast. You can use it to teleport short distances by pressing "B".

DA_ItemType_Furniture_ArtFishing.name: "One Summer Solstice"
DA_ItemType_Furniture_ArtFishing.description: A classic piece from the esteemed Fenske family of artists.

DA_ItemType_Larva_Worm.name: Worm Larva
DA_ItemType_Larva_Worm.description: A still-growing worm larva. With enough food, it'll grow into an adult worm.

DA_ItemType_Medal.name: Fishing Medal
DA_ItemType_Medal.description: Use to acquire a Medal used to purchase fishing equipment at the Fishing Guild.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_Bouquet.name: Sundrop Lily
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_Bouquet.description: A bright, cheery, and fragrant bouquet.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_ChefsHat.name: Chef's Hat
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_ChefsHat.description: A chef's hat given to you by Reth.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_Dragonfly.name: Firebreathing Dragonfly
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_Dragonfly.description: An ultra rare fire-breathing dragonfly that Auni can't keep in his house!

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_Key.name: Old Key
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_Key.description: The artifact Jina has been looking for.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign1.name: Communicator Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign1.description: Blueprints for a set of short-distance two-way communicators. Seems like they could be pretty useful.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign2.name: Mechanical Chapaa Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign2.description: Blueprints for some sort of mechanical chapaa. It doesn't look particularly useful, but it sure is cute!

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign3.name: Propeller Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign3.description: Blueprints for some sort of underwater propeller. Seems like it can reach pretty high speeds while submerged.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign4.name: Waterproof Lantern Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign4.description: Blueprints for a large waterproof lantern. It seems designed to glow brighter than typical light sources.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign5.name: Rebreather Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_LetaDesign5.description: Blueprints for some sort of device that recycles air.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_NajumaDesign.name: Najuma's Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_NajumaDesign.description: Blueprints for some sort of protective suit. There are two sets of handwriting on it, one faded, one new.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_NajumaDesign_Mater.name: List of Materials
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_NajumaDesign_Mater.description: A list of supplies in Najuma's handwriting. Some things are crossed out, including the materials you've already brought her.

DA_ItemType_QuestItem_NajumaDesign_Updat.name: Updated Blueprints
DA_ItemType_QuestItem_NajumaDesign_Updat.description: A blueprint for some sort of protective suit. Zeki's made some helpful changes to the design in a messy scrawl.

DA_ItemType_QuestRecipe_Boullabaise.name: Bouillabaisse Recipe Book
DA_ItemType_QuestRecipe_Boullabaise.description: A recipe book for Bouillabaisse. Maybe Reth would like it?

DA_ItemType_QuestRecipe_Pie.name: Berry Pie Recipe Book
DA_ItemType_QuestRecipe_Pie.description: A recipe book for Boysenberry Pie. Maybe Reth would like it?

DA_ItemType_Quest_Einar_Adornment.name: Einar's Adornment
DA_ItemType_Quest_Einar_Adornment.description: A special adorment gifted to you from Einar in exchange for finding all of his pebbles.

DA_ItemType_Recipe_SoupBroth.name: Recipe: Soup Broth
DA_ItemType_Recipe_SoupBroth.description: A recipe for a vegetable broth.

DA_ItemType_Romance_Pin_Reth.name: Reth's Pin
DA_ItemType_Romance_Pin_Reth.description: A gift from Reth to show his feelings for you. Wear the pin to show your feelings for him.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Dispel.name: Dispel Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Dispel.description: An arrow that deals high damage and disrupts the magical abilities of powerful creatures.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Exquisite.name: Exquisite Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Exquisite.description: A regular arrow that deals extreme damage.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fine.name: Fine Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fine.description: A regular arrow that deals high damage.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Lethargy.name: Slowdown Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Lethargy.description: An arrow that does average damage and slows creatures down.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Simple.name: Makeshift Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Simple.description: A simple arrow that deals low damage.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Standard.name: Standard Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Standard.description: A regular arrow that deals average damage.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Standard.name: Standard Smoke Bomb
DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Standard.description: Is there a bug bugging you? Use this smoke bomb to catch it!

DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Stealth.name: Sneaky Smoke Bomb
DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Stealth.description: Be very, very quiet... This smoke bomb that prevents you from alerting bugs.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Sticky.name: Sticky Smoke Bomb
DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Sticky.description: Whoa there! This smoke bomb that slows down all insects in a given area.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Supreme.name: Supreme Smoke Bomb
DA_ItemType_Ammo_InsectBall_Supreme.description: You never miss! This smoke bomb has a perfect catch rate.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fireworks_Random.name: Fireworks Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fireworks_Random.description: An arrow that explodes in an array of brightly-colored fireworks. Definitely, complete, safe.

DA_ItemType_Fireworks_Sparkler_Random.name: Maji Market Sparkler
DA_ItemType_Fireworks_Sparkler_Random.description: Ignites with a shower of colorful sparkles.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fireworks_typeA_B.name: Blue Waterfall Firework
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fireworks_typeA_B.description: A dazzling firework that creates a cascade of blue lights that fall through the sky.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fireworks_typeA_G.name: Green Waterfall Firework
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_Fireworks_typeA_G.description: A dazzling firework that creates a cascade of green lights that fall through the sky.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksChappa.name: Dragon Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksChappa.description: Explodes in a shower of dragon fireworks.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksDragon.name: Dragon Firework
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksDragon.description: A magical firework that creates a majestic, living trail inspired by Maji the Dragon.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksOrmu.name: Dragon Arrow
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksOrmu.description: Explodes in a shower of dragon fireworks.

DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksPhoenix.name: Phoenix Firework
DA_ItemType_Ammo_Arrow_FireworksPhoenix.description: A magical firework that creates a bright, living explosion inspired by Embra the Phoenix.

DA_ItemType_BugConsumable_HoneyLure.name: Honey Lure
DA_ItemType_BugConsumable_HoneyLure.description: When placed on the ground, lures more insects for a short period of time.

DA_ItemType_BugConsumable_SmokeCandle.name: Smoke Candle
DA_ItemType_BugConsumable_SmokeCandle.description: Emits a soothing smoke that lasts prevents you from alerting bugs.

DA_ItemType_BugConsumable_StickyNet.name: Sticky Coating
DA_ItemType_BugConsumable_StickyNet.description: Net becomes sticky, slowing bugs down.  Lasts 10 minutes.

DA_ItemType_Bug_BeeR.name: Golden Glory Bee
DA_ItemType_Bug_BeeR.description:
A rare bee, imported from the Akwindu province. Mead made from this bee's honey is said to be heavily consumed by the Queen of the province and her family.
Has a chance to be found when chopping trees in Kilima during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleC.name: Spotted Stinkbug
DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleC.description:
A bug known more for his strong musk than its striking colors.
Found all around Kilima and Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleE.name: Ancient Amber Beetle
DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleE.description:
One of the oldest known insects species in Palia, was said to exist in the time of humans.
Found in the forests of Bahari Bay. Also has a chance to be found when chopping trees in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleR.name: Raspberry Beetle
DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleR.description:
A beetle whose entire diet consists of raspberries.
Found around Badruu's Farm in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleU.name: Proudhorned Stag Beetle
DA_ItemType_Bug_BeetleU.description:
The horns of this stag beetle are said to resemble that of the Proudhorned Sernuk.
Has a chance to be found when mining in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_BeeU.name: Bahari Bee
DA_ItemType_Bug_BeeU.description:
A local species of bees, known to produce delicious honey.
Has a chance to be found when chopping trees in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyC.name: Common Blue Butterfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyC.description:
Ever resilient. Butterflies of this type can be found in almost every climate in Palia.
Found all around Kilima and Bahari Bay during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyE.name: Rainbow-tipped Butterfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyE.description:
Ancient legends say this rare butterfly got its beautiful coloring from dipping the tip of its wings in a Well of Flow.
Found in the Fields of Bahari Bay during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyR.name: Brighteye Butterfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyR.description:
Whenever you see the sun out, you can see the eyes of this intricately patterned butterfly looking around Bahari Bay.
Found in the Forests of Bahari Bay during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyU.name: Duskwing Butterfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_ButterflyU.description:
A beautiful butterfly with wings the color of dusk. Unique to the Kilima Valley.
Found around the Dragon Shrine in Kilima during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CicadaC.name: Common Bark Cicada
DA_ItemType_Bug_CicadaC.description:
A common cicada.
Found attached to trees in Bahari Bay during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CicadaR.name: Spitfire Cicada
DA_ItemType_Bug_CicadaR.description:
A spirited cicada, whose bark is worse than its bite.
Found attached to trees in Bahari Bay during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CicadaU.name: Cerulean Cicada
DA_ItemType_Bug_CicadaU.description:
The call of this cicada is so soothing, it was said to be the inspiration for Ayana's fourth symphony.
Found attached to trees in Bahari Bay during the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CrabC.name: Bahari Crab
DA_ItemType_Bug_CrabC.description:
A local crab, known to taste good with drawn butter.
Found along the coast of Bahari Bay. Also has a chance to be found when foraging shells in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CrabR.name: Vampire Crab
DA_ItemType_Bug_CrabR.description:
An invasive species of crab that sucks the life out of the local population.
Found around the Flooded Fortress in Bahari Bay during the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CrabU.name: Spineshell Crab
DA_ItemType_Bug_CrabU.description:
A crab with a very spiny shell.
Found along the coast of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CricketC.name: Common Field Cricket
DA_ItemType_Bug_CricketC.description:
Field crickets can be found anywhere you can find a field.
Found all around Kilima and Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CricketR.name: Azure Stonehopper
DA_ItemType_Bug_CricketR.description:
This little blue beauty has been known to camouflage itself as a shiny blue pebble.
Found in the fields of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_CricketU.name: Garden Leafhopper
DA_ItemType_Bug_CricketU.description:
The Garden Leafhopper is such a delight in Palia that many children keep them as pets. They are said to bring good luck.
Found in the fields and Badruu's Farm in Kilima. Also has a chance to be found when foraging in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyC.name: Brushtail Dragonfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyC.description:
The tail of this Dragonfly is so bright and vibrant, some early Majiri were said to have used it as a paintbrush.
Found around the lake in Kilima, as well as rivers and ponds in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyE.name: Jewelwing Dragonfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyE.description:
A Dragonfly with wings as bright and colorful as any precious stone.
Found near a cave entrance on a cliff in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyR.name: Firebreathing Dragonfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyR.description:
This Dragonfly is notoriously difficult to catch, in part due to its fiery breath.
Found in the fields of Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyU.name: Inky Dragonfly
DA_ItemType_Bug_DragonflyU.description:
This stealthy Dragonfly is used as a component in various black dyes and inks.
Found around rivers and ponds in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_GlowbugC.name: Paper Lantern Bug
DA_ItemType_Bug_GlowbugC.description:
This bug glows as brightly as a colorful feast day lantern taking flight into the Palian night sky.
Found along the coast and in forests of Bahari Bay during the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Bug_GlowbugR.name: Bahari Glowbug
DA_ItemType_Bug_GlowbugR.description:
A local species of bioluminescent fauna. Discovered by Professor Bonlin Amepongo.
Found in the fields of Bahari Bay during the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Bug_Glow_Worm.name: Glow Worm
DA_ItemType_Bug_Glow_Worm.description: A glowing flowing worm. Attach to your fishing rod to attract rare fish.

DA_ItemType_Bug_LadybugR.name: Princess Ladybug
DA_ItemType_Bug_LadybugR.description:
A very regal looking lady bug, made popular by the children's fairytale, The Princess Who Turned Into A Ladybug.
Found around the lake in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_LadybugU.name: Garden Ladybug
DA_ItemType_Bug_LadybugU.description:
A black and red ladybug, popular for controlling garden pests.
Has a chance to be found when foraging in the fields of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisE.name: Fairy Mantis
DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisE.description:
A mantis from early Majiri legend only recently confirmed to exist by modern entomologists. Said to have magical properties.
Found in the fields of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisR1.name: Spotted Mantis
DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisR1.description:
A rare mantis with a beautiful set of spots.
Found around the Dragon Shrine in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisR2.name: Leafstalker Mantis
DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisR2.description:
An herbivorous mantis that exclusively eats leaves.
Has a chance to be found when foraging in the forests of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisU.name: Garden Mantis
DA_ItemType_Bug_MantisU.description:
Nothing to see here. Just your garden variety mantis.
Found around the lake in Kilima. Also has a chance to be found when foraging around the lake in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MothC.name: Kilima Night Moth
DA_ItemType_Bug_MothC.description:
While beautiful, the Kilima night moth is so prevalent on hot summer nights that some consider it to be a pest. Keep away from stored cloth.
Found all around Kilima and Bahari Bay during the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MothR.name: Gossamer Veil Moth
DA_ItemType_Bug_MothR.description:
The wings of this moth are so thin that some say you can see a peek of the Dragon Realm by looking through them.
Found in the fields of Kilima during the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Bug_MothU.name: Lunar Fairy Moth
DA_ItemType_Bug_MothU.description:
The Lunar Fairy Moth is said to have a very special connection to the Dragon Moon, and is said to only appear at special times during its cycle.
Found in the fields and forests of Bahari Bay during the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Bug_PedeR1.name: Hairy Millipede
DA_ItemType_Bug_PedeR1.description:
A millipede with a hair growth problem.
Found in the forests of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_PedeR2.name: Scintillating Centipede
DA_ItemType_Bug_PedeR2.description:
A rare centipede with a shiny hard shell.
Has a chance to be found when mining in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_PedeU.name: Garden Millipede
DA_ItemType_Bug_PedeU.description:
A brown and green millipede that loves feasting on garden crops.
Found in the fields of Kilima. Also has a chance to be found when foraging in the fields of Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Bug_SnailR.name: Stripeshell Snail
DA_ItemType_Bug_SnailR.description:
A snail with such distinctive stripes, that its shell was once used as currency among the early Majiri.
Found along the coast in Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_SnailU.name: Garden Snail
DA_ItemType_Bug_SnailU.description:
A snail that has evolved over time to look like a leaf. Good for hiding from predators, bad for hiding from the Leafstalker Mantis.
Found along the coast and in forests of Bahari Bay.

DA_ItemType_Bug_Worm.name: Worm
DA_ItemType_Bug_Worm.description: A regular earth worm. Attach to your fishing rod to attract different fish.

DA_ItemType_Cooking_Failure.name: Ruined Food
DA_ItemType_Cooking_Failure.description: This recipe didn't go according to plan. Perhaps the worms will eat it?

DA_ItemType_C_BanhMi.name: Reth's Bnh M
DA_ItemType_C_BanhMi.description: Cold cuts and pickled veggies in an airy roll. Inspired by a sandwich Reth once found by a waterfall. Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_Bao.name: Reth's Hearty Veggie Bao
DA_ItemType_C_Bao.description: Just like soup! But in dumpling form. Very juicy, so remember a napkin! Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_Breakfast_MushroomQuiche.name: Mushroom Quiche
DA_ItemType_C_Breakfast_MushroomQuiche.description: A savory quiche. The mushrooms compliment the cheese perfectly.

DA_ItemType_C_Breakfast_QuicheLorraine.name: Quiche Bahari
DA_ItemType_C_Breakfast_QuicheLorraine.description: A protein-packed breakfast quiche from Bahari City. Enough meat and eggs to keep you going all day.

DA_ItemType_C_BunnyCake.name: Delaila's Hopalong Puff
DA_ItemType_C_BunnyCake.description: Soft and sweet, just like a real hopalong! And so light and fluffy, it might float right to the moons.. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_ChapaaPop.name: Chapaa Pop
DA_ItemType_C_ChapaaPop.description: Ice cream inspired by a chapaa's adorable face. Eat the eyes first before they fall out. Sold at Chapaa Hut.

DA_ItemType_C_CornDogs.name: Reth's Corn Dogs
DA_ItemType_C_CornDogs.description: Corn-battered, deep-fried sausages. Food always tastes better on a stick. Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_CelebrationCake.name: Celebration Cake
DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_CelebrationCake.description: Delicious, decorated, and designed for special occasions, it's a piece of cake to make this pretty cake. Just do the cooking by the book.

DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_Macaron.name: Macaron
DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_Macaron.description: Light, delicate cookie sandwiches filled with buttercream. It's hard to eat just one.

DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_Pie_Apple.name: Apple Pie
DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_Pie_Apple.description: An apple pie made with heartwarming spices. A Daiya family recipe specially created to beat those snobs in Harvest Meadows.

DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_Pie_Berry.name: Blueberry Pie
DA_ItemType_C_Dessert_Pie_Berry.description: A pie with a sweet and tangy blueberry filling, perfect for a summer picnic.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Catfish.name: Fried Catfish Dinner
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Catfish.description: Battered, fried catfish served with a fresh, tomato salsa. Taylin's favorite weeknight dish for picky children.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_ChapaaMasala.name: Chapaa Masala
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_ChapaaMasala.description: Tender cubes of chapaa meat cooked in a rich curry, garnished with fresh cream. For those who need more spice in their life.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Mushroom.name: Bacon-Stuffed Mushrooms
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Mushroom.description: Sauted mushrooms caps stuffed with bacon and tomato. A dish Delaila used to win Badruu's heart.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_SalisburyChapaa.name: Akwinduu Chapaa
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_SalisburyChapaa.description: Chapaa patties in mushroom gravy, served with roast potatoes. Invented by a wealthy Akwinduu chef and loved by fancy people worldwide.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Steak.name: Steak Dinner
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Steak.description: Steak seared in herb butter, served with a baguette. This versatile recipe adapts easily to most meats.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Tomato.name: Stuffed Tomatoes
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Tomato.description: Tomatoes in butter, stuffed with their own, spiced, innards. Don't think too hard about it.

DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Trout.name: Trout Dinner
DA_ItemType_C_Dinner_Trout.description: Garlic-seared trout with potatoes, created so ancient humans could share Einar's love of fishing. Hook fish more quickly for a short time.

DA_ItemType_C_FishermansBrew.name: Fisherman's Brew
DA_ItemType_C_FishermansBrew.description: This suspicious drink has a strange odor that can only be described as 'mossy,' but Einar swears by it. Buffs fishing reticle size for a short time.

DA_ItemType_C_FriedPiqni.name: Reth's Hot Peki Wings
DA_ItemType_C_FriedPiqni.description: Battered, fried, peki wings shaken in a secret spice mix. Feel the burn! Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_FriedRice.name: Veggie Fried Rice
DA_ItemType_C_FriedRice.description: Rice and vegetables fried in a pan with fresh eggs, making a savory main or side dish. Also a great way to use up leftovers.

DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Fish.name: Grilled Fish
DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Fish.description: Grill fish on a fire, and you've got food.

DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Meat.name: Grilled Meat
DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Meat.description: When heat grills meat, you've got a great meal.

DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Mushroom.name: Grilled Mushroom
DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Mushroom.description: Munch on these mushrooms grilled over a campfire.

DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Oyster.name: Grilled Oyster
DA_ItemType_C_Grilled_Oyster.description: Oysters grilled over an open fire, no oven needed!

DA_ItemType_C_HaloHalo.name: Delaila's Halo Halo
DA_ItemType_C_HaloHalo.description: A shaved ice treat topped with mix of fruit, jelly, and condensed milk. Say hello to an explosion of flavor. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_HandheldCrepe.name: Delaila's Handy Crepe
DA_ItemType_C_HandheldCrepe.description: A thin pancake with fruit and cream. Turn the cone upside-down and put it on your head for a cute, if sticky, hat. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_MeatyUdon.name: Meaty Udon
DA_ItemType_C_MeatyUdon.description: Like mushroom udon, but with meat. Still garnished with green onion. A hearty meal that's great for winter.

DA_ItemType_C_MelonPan.name: Delaila's Melon Bun
DA_ItemType_C_MelonPan.description: A sweet bun with crisp topping. Does not contain melon, just looks like one. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_Mochi.name: Reth's Ice Cream Mochi
DA_ItemType_C_Mochi.description: A scoop of ice cream wrapped in mochi. An adorable collaboration between Reth and Delaila. Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_Onigiri.name: Chapaa Onigiri
DA_ItemType_C_Onigiri.description: Bring home the taste of Maji Market by making these rice balls stuffed with buttery chapaa meat. They fit conveniently in your pockets!

DA_ItemType_C_PeachCake.name: Delaila's Peach Cake
DA_ItemType_C_PeachCake.description: Soft sponge cake shaped and flavored like a peach. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_Poke.name: Poke Bowl
DA_ItemType_C_Poke.description: A colorful Maji Market delicacy of raw fish, vegetables, and spices. Popular in Inyrevn due to the region's abundance of fresh seafood.

DA_ItemType_C_Ramen.name: Ramen
DA_ItemType_C_Ramen.description: Hand-pulled noodles in garlic broth, topped with soft-boiled egg and mushrooms. Can be served in a cup.

DA_ItemType_C_RedBeanMochi.name: Reth's Red Bean Mochi
DA_ItemType_C_RedBeanMochi.description: Glutinous rice balls filled with sweet, red bean paste. Soft and chewy when fresh. Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_RethBouillabaisse.name: Reth's Bouillabaisse
DA_ItemType_C_RethBouillabaisse.description: Reth's claims his latest seafood concotion is strangely popular because when you see food, you eat it. Served at the Ormuu's Horn.

DA_ItemType_C_RethOnigiri.name: Reth's Onigiri
DA_ItemType_C_RethOnigiri.description: Rice balls stuffed with various secret and potentially questionable fillings. Each one is a surprise! Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_RethPoke.name: Reth's Poke Bowl
DA_ItemType_C_RethPoke.description: Fresh fish marinated in spices and served on a bed of seasoned rice. A Kilima take on an Inyrevn classic. Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_RethPotatoSoup.name: Reth's Potato Soup
DA_ItemType_C_RethPotatoSoup.description: Soup that Reth created specifically for a client who was allergic to lettuce. Served at the Ormuu's Horn.

DA_ItemType_C_RethSteakDinner.name: Reth's Steak Dinner
DA_ItemType_C_RethSteakDinner.description: The daily special, made with meat provided by Hassian each morning. Served at the Ormuu's Horn.

DA_ItemType_C_RethVeggieSoup.name: Reth's Veggie Soup
DA_ItemType_C_RethVeggieSoup.description: Mostly lettuce. At least it has enough vegetable matter to be considered hearty. Served at the Ormuu's Horn.

DA_ItemType_C_RolledIceCream.name: Delaila's Rolled Ice Cream
DA_ItemType_C_RolledIceCream.description: Rolls of ice cream topped with even more treats. Worth the brain freeze! Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_RollPastry.name: Delaila's Spiced Sweet Roll
DA_ItemType_C_RollPastry.description: Pastry rolled with Delaila's sweet spice mix. Her secret ingredient is joy. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_Sashimi.name: Sashimi
DA_ItemType_C_Sashimi.description: A minimal meal of slices of raw fish, with a side of plain rice. Buffs fishing rod health for a short time.

DA_ItemType_C_Stew_Bouilbaisse.name: Bouillabaisse
DA_ItemType_C_Stew_Bouilbaisse.description: A rich seafood stew, served with potatoes and bread. Perhaps ancient humans once enjoyed this.

DA_ItemType_C_Stew_CearnukNoodle.name: Sernuk Noodle Stew
DA_ItemType_C_Stew_CearnukNoodle.description: An army stew traditionally made with foraged vegetables. Civilian chefs elevated it with spices and noodles

DA_ItemType_C_Stew_Fish.name: Fish Stew
DA_ItemType_C_Stew_Fish.description: A basic fish stock seasoned with garlic and spices. Buffs fishing reticle speed for a short time.

DA_ItemType_C_StinkyTofu.name: Reth's Stinky Tofu
DA_ItemType_C_StinkyTofu.description: Fermented tofu that tastes better than it smells. Promise. Sold at Reth's Street Specialties.

DA_ItemType_C_StirFry.name: Meaty Stir Fry
DA_ItemType_C_StirFry.description: A healthy mix of sauted meat and vegetables, served with rice. Still filled with the heat of the wok even after it's served.

DA_ItemType_C_Sushi.name: Sushi
DA_ItemType_C_Sushi.description: A pleasant meal of seasoned rice topped with raw fish, garnished with spices. Buffs fishing rod health for a short time.

DA_ItemType_C_TangHuLu.name: Delaila's Tanghulu
DA_ItemType_C_TangHuLu.description: Strawberries in a thick, candy coating. Can also be made with hawthorn. Sold at Delaila's Sweet Treats.

DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Carrot.name: Creamy Carrot Soup
DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Carrot.description: A yummy, cream soup guaranteed to use up all your carrots. If you didn't feed them to the ormuu already.

DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Hearty.name: Hearty Vegetable Soup
DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Hearty.description: A classic Kilima soup packed with foraged mushrooms and farm-fresh vegetables, made any way you like.

DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Mushroom.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Mushroom.description: Mushroom soup packed with aliums and earthy flavors, thickened with cream. Jina's favorite brain food.

DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Onion.name: Palian Onion Soup
DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Onion.description: Simple soup using base of garlic and carmelized onions, often made by Eshe's childhood housekeeper.

DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Potato.name: Loaded Potato Soup
DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Potato.description: A dense, potato soup packed with filling bacon. Najuma's treat for her father after a long day in the mines.

DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Tomato.name: Cream of Tomato Soup
DA_ItemType_C_VegetableSoup_Tomato.description: A tomato soup thickened with cream, served with a baguette. Seems like Reth may be trying something new.

DA_ItemType_C_VeggieUdon.name: Mushroom Udon
DA_ItemType_C_VeggieUdon.description: A popular dish of thick, chewy, noodles in a mushroom and garlic broth, garnished with green onion.

DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_HeatRoot.name: Chopped Heat Root
DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_HeatRoot.description: Heat Root chopped up for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_Meat_Chapaa.name: Chopped Chapaa Meat
DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_Meat_Chapaa.description: Chapaa meat chopped up for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_Meat_Sernuk.name: Chopped Sernuk Meat
DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_Meat_Sernuk.description: Sernuk meat chopped up for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_SpiceSprouts.name: Chopped Spice Sprouts
DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_SpiceSprouts.description: Spice Sprouts chopped up for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_SpicyPepper.name: Chopped Spicy Pepper
DA_ItemType_IG_Chopped_SpicyPepper.description: Spicy Pepper chopped up for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ground_DariCloves.name: Ground Dari Cloves
DA_ItemType_IG_Ground_DariCloves.description: Dari Cloves ground into a powder for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ground_SweetLeaf.name: Ground Sweet Leaf
DA_ItemType_IG_Ground_SweetLeaf.description: Sweet leaf ground into a sugar suitable for cooking.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_CakeLayerJelli.name: Jellied Cake Layer
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_CakeLayerJelli.description: A layer of cake topped with jelly.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_CakeLayerPlain.name: Cake Layer
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_CakeLayerPlain.description: A plain layer of cake fresh out of the oven.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_Rice.name: Cooked Rice
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_Rice.description: A steaming bowl of cooked white rice.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_RoastedPotato.name: Roasted Potatoes
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_RoastedPotato.description: Potatoes chopped and cooked in the Oven.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_Salsa.name: Salsa
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_Salsa.description: A mixture of tomatoes, onions, and spices.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_SearedChapaa.name: Seared Chapaa
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_SearedChapaa.description: Chapaa meat seared in herb butter.

DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_SpiceMix.name: Heavenly Spice Mix
DA_ItemType_IG_Ingredient_SpiceMix.description: A fragrant mixture of several spices.

DA_ItemType_Crop_Apple.name: Apple
DA_ItemType_Crop_Apple.description: Cruchy when raw and sweet when cooked, an apple a day keeps the healer away! Eat up!

DA_ItemType_Crop_Blueberries.name: Blueberries
DA_ItemType_Crop_Blueberries.description: Feeling blue? Grab a handful of blueberries. They're sure to make you smile raw or baked!

DA_ItemType_Crop_Carrot.name: Carrot
DA_ItemType_Crop_Carrot.description: This sweet, orange, carrot will improve your eyesight, raw or cooked. It's full of vitamin see!

DA_ItemType_Crop_Cotton.name: Cotton
DA_ItemType_Crop_Cotton.description: Fluffy cotton can be spun into fabric. This crop is not edible. Don't say you weren't warned.

DA_ItemType_Crop_Onion.name: Onion
DA_ItemType_Crop_Onion.description: Cooked onions lend fragrant base to any dish. But some folks prefer them raw. Like Nai'o.

DA_ItemType_Crop_Potato.name: Potato
DA_ItemType_Crop_Potato.description: Boil 'em, mash 'em, stick 'em in a stew! Versatile potatoes add heartiness to any cooked meal.

DA_ItemType_Crop_Rice.name: Rice
DA_ItemType_Crop_Rice.description: Need a satisfying, fluffy, grain to cook your dish? Well, it's rice to meet you!

DA_ItemType_Crop_Tomato.name: Tomato
DA_ItemType_Crop_Tomato.description: This juicy, red tomato may have a saucy attitude, but it tastes great either raw or cooked.

DA_ItemType_Crop_Wheat.name: Wheat
DA_ItemType_Crop_Wheat.description: Fee, fi, fo, fum! Don't you worry your pretty head, just grind this wheat to bake your bread.

DA_ItemType_Weed_Knapweed.name: Knapweed
DA_ItemType_Weed_Knapweed.description: A common weed, but it's not without its uses.

DA_ItemType_Weed_Thistle.name: Thistle
DA_ItemType_Weed_Thistle.description: A common weed, but it's not without its uses.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_01_furniture.name: Moonstruck Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_01_furniture.description: You're probably up and about a lot, but be sure to rest every so often! When you finally need that evening lie-down, this couch is there for you.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_02_furniture.name: Moonstruck Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_02_furniture.description: The unique shape of this coffee table draws from a long-lost Majiri society. Or a work of fiction. It's hard to tell.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_03_furniture.name: Moonstruck Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_03_furniture.description: This rug promises to do it all, even if you asked for every star in the sky. Though whether it can uphold those vows is debatable.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_04_furniture.name: Moonstruck Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_04_furniture.description: This bookshelf is for the student with dreams big enough to reach the atmosphere. Even if you miss your shot, you'll land among the stars.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_05_furniture.name: Moonstruck Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_05_furniture.description: Tired of casting spells on the floor? Use this shelf to build yourself a brand-new, full-blown altar!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_06_deco_grim.name: Moonstruck Grimoire
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_06_deco_grim.description: Looking for a little more magic in your life? This book, with its variety of incantations, will certainly spell out a solution for you.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_08_furniture.name: Moonstruck Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_08_furniture.description: Everyone has secrets. Keep yours in this nightstand's hidden compartment, and even the Order won't know!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_09_furniture.name: Moonstruck Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_09_furniture.description: Every ritual requires the right ceremonial robe! Keep them all inside this wondrous wardrobe.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_10_furniture.name: Moonstruck Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_10_furniture.description: Why have a carpet just for your hallway when you can have one that shoots to the stratosphere? This runner doesn't, but you can pretend.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_11_furniture.name: Moonstruck Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_11_furniture.description: Sometimes sleep feels just out of reach. Bring it into your grasp with this bed. No more tossing and turning at night!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_12_deco_larg.name: Moonstruck Wall Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_12_deco_larg.description: Hanging your herbs to dry on this wall decor to cleanse the air in your home.  And soon, they'll be ready for potions!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_13_deco_plan.name: Moonstruck Fungi Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_13_deco_plan.description: Bubble, bubble, toil and troubles! Fire burn, and cauldron doubles... as a nifty mushroom planter.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_15_lighting_.name: Moonstruck Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_15_lighting_.description: This ancient chandelier with a mysterious past. It must hold an untold number of stories, but it can't tell them to you. It's a lamp.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_16_lighting_.name: Moonstruck Table Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_16_lighting_.description: The underground nation of Umbraa is known for exporting crystal lamps. But this one tastes just like table salt.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_17_furniture.name: Moonstruck Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_17_furniture.description: This dining chair's asymmetrical aesthetic is inspired by the unpredictable qualities of nature.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_18_furniture.name: Moonstruck Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_18_furniture.description: This dining table comes already inscribed with standard symbols for the student spellcaster.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_22_furniture.name: Moonstruck Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_22_furniture.description: Hey diddle diddle, Grimalkin and fiddle! You'll be so happy with this bathtub you'll jump through the night sky like an ormuu.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_23_furniture.name: Moonstruck Small Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_23_furniture.description: A handwoven rug whose patterns draw from ancient Majiri society symbols for expression and nobility.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_25_furniture.name: Moonstruck Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_25_furniture.description: The night may seem pure black on the night of a double new moon, but this lantern has your back and will light any path you need.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_26_furniture.name: Moonstruck Sundial
DA_ItemType_Decor_Alchemist_26_furniture.description: When a clock won't cut it, track your sun cycles via sundial instead! Less effective indoors.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_02_deco_80s_s.name: Sick Style Bahari Board
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_02_deco_80s_s.description: The design on the bottom of this Bahari Board looks like sick tracks from leaving everyone in the dust.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_03_deco_80s_s.name: Sweep the Bahari Board Wall Rack
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_03_deco_80s_s.description: You've conquered every halfpipe, ollie, and kickstand. This rack of Bahari Boards is proof you've won every challenge that's come your way.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_05_deco_chapa.name: Chapaa Hut Fun Guy Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_05_deco_chapa.description: This huggable chapaa plush is holding an equally cuddly mushroom, and he's ready to have a good time with his new friend: you!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_11_deco_jolly.name: The Icing On Your Cake Stand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_11_deco_jolly.description: There's no better way to show off your baking skills than with this sugary-sweet cake stand. Wait, that's a real cake, right?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_18_deco_bee_b.name: Honeybunch Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_18_deco_bee_b.description: Every night, bees return to the hive, and we return to our homes. It's always worth making time to go back to the things you love.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_19_deco_bee_c.name: Honeybunch Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_19_deco_bee_c.description: Every hive needs a queen, and you can feel like royalty in this comfy bee-shaped armchair.  Don't let the buzz go to your head.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_20_deco_bee_b.name: Honeybunch Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_20_deco_bee_b.description: This bookshelf is for people who are drawn to books as bees are drawn to nectar. But one nourishes the mind and the other, the body.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_26_deco_bee_b.name: Me n' My Honeybunch Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_26_deco_bee_b.description: Pick up this adorable bee plush, and the two of you will be inseparable. You'll go to the park, the cafe, the beach... Wait, no, it's not a date!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_27_deco_chapa.name: Chapaa Hut Chapaa Mug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_27_deco_chapa.description: Enjoy any drink, hot or cold, from this ceramic chapaa head. Best suited to Chapaa Hut's line of carbonated beverages.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_28_deco_ormuu.name: Ormuu Shack Ormuu Mug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_28_deco_ormuu.description: A ceramic mug that was one of Ormuu Shack's limited-edition collectibles. Way better than Chapaa Hut.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_29_deco_singi.name: Sage's Marble Singing Bowl
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_29_deco_singi.description: With this singing bowl, you can find inner peace by drowning your anxieties in a sound bath.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Deco_Rugs01.name: Dragontide Abstract Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Deco_Rugs01.description: This large rug depicts an abstract design of opposing forces in balance, a perfect metaphor for harmony.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Deco_Rugs02.name: Dragontide Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Deco_Rugs02.description: This runner is an artist's take on the Dragon's scales. You can imagine yourself running along his spine!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Deco_Rugs03.name: Dragontide Round Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Deco_Rugs03.description: The circular shape of this soft, high-pile rug is practically irresistible to plumehounds. And Grimalkin.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Bed.name: Dragontide Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Bed.description: Ever feel you've taken a beating and just need to collapse? Lie down on this bed, and let the healing aura of Maji soothe your aches.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Bed_B.name: Dragontide Silken Chaise
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Bed_B.description: This silken chaise is a superior seat to start some draconian-level drama. Lean back, lounge a little, and let the rumors fly!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Book_.name: Dragontide Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Book_.description: Submerge in the gift of knowledge and expand your personal library with this carefully handcrafted bookshelf.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Coffe.name: Dragontide Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Coffe.description: This low table is popular among tea-drinkers looking to catch up with old friends. Great with floor pillows.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Couch.name: Dragontide Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Couch.description: Some folks take all day to say nothing. At least, when they invite themselves over, you can fall asleep on this couch as they drone.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Cozy_.name: Dragontide Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Cozy_.description: This ornate armchair is sculpted with the natural motifs of Palian Sages. Its flowing shapes help relax the mind.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Dinin.name: Dragontide Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Dinin.description: Despite being wood, this dining chair is so comfortable, your guests may forget what they are eating.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Dinin.name: Dragontide Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Dinin.description: Feast your eyes on this magnificent table whose elegant carvings remind us how nature feeds us all.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Kitch.name: Dragontide Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Kitch.description: This pantry's Dragon-like motifs remind Palians to practice hospitality: always have enough food for guests.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Night.name: Dragontide Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Night.description: Crafted from the finest wood in Kilima, golden accents give a divine touch to this nightstand.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Parti.name: Dragontide Folding Screen
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Parti.description: A folding screen for people who go asking for trouble. You could be doing anything behind it. Something good? Something bad? Who knows!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Shelv.name: Dragontide Round Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Shelv.description: The Dragon encourages his people to learn, and no education is complete without a well-stocked bookshelf.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Speci.name: Dragontide Orchid Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Speci.description: Ancient sages spent years cultivating a special blue orchid to honor the Dragon. It's still very expensive.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Speci.name: Dragontide Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Speci.description: Plumes of carved smoke wind around this elegant mirror. Stare into its glass, and you'll feel calmed as if watching waves on a lake.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Stand.name: Dragontide End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Stand.description: Living modestly lets us appreciate the world around us. This end table is the perfect size, no more, no less.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Stora.name: Dragontide Sideboard
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Stora.description: This sturdy sideboard stores healer's herbs and medicines, and even has a countertop for potion making.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Wall_.name: Dragontide Wall Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Wall_.description: Feeling a little slow? Just look at this clock! It's time to stand up, walk out that door, and meet some brand new friends!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Wardr.name: Dragontide Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Furniture_Wardr.description: Living simply doesn't mean living slovenly! This wardrobe will help keep you and your garments gorgeous.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Indoor_Deco_01_.name: Dragontide Fern Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Indoor_Deco_01_.description: Palians think the leaves of this fern resemble the Dragon's tail. It's said to invite calm breezes into any room.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Indoor_Deco_02_.name: Dragontide Flower Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Indoor_Deco_02_.description: Some sages use this flower to craft perfumes, but others prefer the scent of fresh petals.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Indoor_Deco_03_.name: Dragontide Wall Fan
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Indoor_Deco_03_.description: Originally used in religious rituals, fans became a fashion statement for rich Palians looking to seem devout.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Chande.name: Dragontide Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Chande.description: No one likes a wet blanket, so get this warm chandelier! It's certain to give life to any party, no matter how dour you may feel.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Hangin.name: Dragontide Hanging Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Hangin.description: This hanging lamp has tassels on the bottom. Your Grimalkin friends will be utterly fixated by it, guaranteed.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Lamp_L.name: Dragontide Standing Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Lamp_L.description: Looking for answers from the Dragon, Maji? Take this lamp home, and let its light help guide you to spiritual healing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Wall_L.name: Dragontide Wall Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Lighting_Wall_L.description: The Dragon rekindled the Phoenix's gift of light for his followers, so they'd learn from her as well.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Outdoor_Deco_02.name: Dragontide Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Outdoor_Deco_02.description: If you feel like you've taken a tumble through the mud, soak in this relaxing bath tub and emerge refreshed. And is that the faint smell of patchouli?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Outdoor_Deco_03.name: Dragontide Hedge Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Outdoor_Deco_03.description: This delicate flower bed is hard to so hard to care for, you'll feel like you were dragged through the brambles. But it's a great way to teach discipline

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Outdoor_Fence.name: Dragontide Fence
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Outdoor_Fence.description: An elegant fence modeled after Dragon Shrine motifs, for the home is equally sacred to Majiri.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Side_Table.name: Dragontide Low End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Dragon_Side_Table.description: A carved dragon winds around the base of this end table. Prop your feet on it as your own day winds down.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_01_furniture_cou.name: Bellflower Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_01_furniture_cou.description: This couch design has been beloved by the Bahari gentry for generations. Lounge on it as you delight in the daintiest of afternoon tea sandwiches.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_02_furniture_cof.name: Bellflower Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_02_furniture_cof.description: This coffee table may be small, but it's made of rare marble. Don't you dare put your feet on it, you cretin!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_03_furniture_rug.name: Bellflower Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_03_furniture_rug.description: Attraction is always unpredictable, but this elegant rug is confident it will catch your eye... and the eye of anyone you're interested in.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_04_furniture_boo.name: Bellflower Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_04_furniture_boo.description: This bookshelf spares no expense and possesses every feature a Bahari scholar might need, whether they be functional or purely aesthetic.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_05_furniture_she.name: Bellflower Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_05_furniture_she.description: This marble shelf turns your belongings into a statement. Eshe has one for her gifts from Kenyara.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_06_furniture_coz.name: Bellflower Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_06_furniture_coz.description: This armchair is surprisingly uncomfortable, but who cares when it's presentation that really matters.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_07_furniture_dre.name: Bellflower Dresser
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_07_furniture_dre.description: This sturdy dresser is a great place to keep records and newspapers. Or if you're Kenli, to lose them.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_08_furniture_nig.name: Bellflower Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_08_furniture_nig.description: Kenyatta keeps her Crime Times mags in one of these nightstands, so the Bahari Ripper can't find them.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_09_furniture_war.name: Bellflower Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_09_furniture_war.description: A wardrobe so big it can fit any collection! Kenli's holds many copies of his hat in case he loses it. Again.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_10_furniture_rug.name: Bellflower Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_10_furniture_rug.description: This fancy rug was designed for the lobby of legendary hotelier and diplomat, Something Bahari, and has been popular ever since.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_11_furniture_bed.name: Bellflower Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_11_furniture_bed.description: Even the most stately of Bahari magistrates have been overwhelmed sometimes. This bed is specially designed to handle all those feelings.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_12_deco_large_wa.name: Bellflower Banner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_12_deco_large_wa.description: This banner hearkens to the arms of Kenren Bahari, one of the first people to govern the Palian Republic.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_13_deco_planter.name: Bellflower Reed Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_13_deco_planter.description: Good governance relies on reason and prudence. Why use more if this planter looks great with one bloom?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_14_deco_picture_.name: Bellflower Picture Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_14_deco_picture_.description: When Kenjon Bahari fell to the Bahari Ripper, his family remembered him with paintings of his favorite flower.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_16_lighting_chan.name: Bellflower Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_16_lighting_chan.description: The most beautiful of chandeliers, inspired by a Bahari family tradition where adults throw lavish parties for children who've chosen their Paths.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_17_lighting_lamp.name: Bellflower Table Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_17_lighting_lamp.description: Kenyara Bahari had a lamp like this in her bedroom. Strangely enough, Eshe likes it as well.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_18_furniture_din.name: Bellflower Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_18_furniture_din.description: Get comfortable with this dining chair. You'll be sitting in it through the entirety of Eshe's dinner party.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_19_furniture_din.name: Bellflower Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_19_furniture_din.description: If you're ever at a party, you'll have to know your way around this dining table. And every set of cutlery, too.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_20_furniture_kit.name: Bellflower Wall Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_20_furniture_kit.description: If you have a fancy wall cabinet, no one can tell if you actually have fancy dishes.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_21_furniture_kit.name: Bellflower Sink
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_21_furniture_kit.description: Big day ahead? A quick wash in this sink will leave you glowing with enthusiasm. Your constituents are gonna love you!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_22_furniture_kit.name: Bellflower Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_22_furniture_kit.description: When chef Enzo left the Bahari Estate, he locked this pantry and took the key. It's yours... if you can open it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_23_furniture_bat.name: Bellflowers Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_23_furniture_bat.description: Warm rain makes flowers bloom. Take your own rejuvenating shower in this elegant bathtub inspired by the Bahari Estate.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_24_furniture_bat.name: Bellflower Small Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_24_furniture_bat.description: Kenyatta thinks the Bahari Ripper wrapped dead bodies in a rug like this. Everyone else thinks it's a rug.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_25_furniture_bat.name: Bellflower Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_25_furniture_bat.description: You're never past your prime when you look in this mirror. It'll give you the attitude you need to feel forever young and beautiful.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_26_furniture_out.name: Bellflower Regal Fountain
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_26_furniture_out.description: Bells may twinkle, but water truly shines. This fountain was designed by a famous architect, but the Baharis lost the record with her name.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_27_furniture_out.name: Bellflower Standing Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_27_furniture_out.description: This gold and marble standing lamp will let you outshine your neighbors, indoors and out!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_28_furniture_out.name: Bellflower Grand Fountain
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_28_furniture_out.description: Of course, the Bahari Estate must have the finest possible fountain in all the world. It also happens to be one of the largest in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_29_furniture_bed.name: Bellflower Curtains
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_29_furniture_bed.description: Feel like part of the gentry with these lavish curtains. Or just use them to keep the light out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_30_furniture_dec.name: Bellflower Alarm Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_30_furniture_dec.description: Eshelon bought this clock for his aunt, Eshe, because it reminded him of her. It sounds louder than it looks.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_33_furniture_toi.name: Bellflower Toilet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_33_furniture_toi.description: Palians embrace the circular nature of life. Everything comes to an end, just like your meals will one day end up in this toilet.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_37_furniture_gar.name: Bellflower Flower Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_37_furniture_gar.description: An overgrown garden would be far too unsightly. Restrain any runaway flowers with this marble planter.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_38_furniture_gar.name: Bellflower Shrub Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Fancy_38_furniture_gar.description: Setting an ordinary shrub in a marble planter creates a gentle reminder to appreciate the everyday things.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_101_Deco_hangi.name: Valley Sunrise Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_101_Deco_hangi.description: A low-hanging chandelier that brings a touch of warmth to your home. Just watch out for those sharp corners.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_102_deco_Sidet.name: Valley Sunrise Side Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_102_deco_Sidet.description: Simple and quaint, this table makes a fashionable addition to any home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_103_deco_vase.name: Valley Sunrise Vase
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_103_deco_vase.description: A cute little vase with a cute little flower inside. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_104_deco_bed.name: Valley Sunrise Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_104_deco_bed.description: Welcome the beautiful sunrise from the comfort of this bed, which keeps you cool on warm nights and snug on cold ones.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_107_deco_garde.name: Garden Variety Shovel
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_107_deco_garde.description: There's nothing particularly noteworthy about this shovel, but it gets the job done.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_113_deco_garde.name: Garden Variety Jug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_113_deco_garde.description: There are many jugs like this in the world, but this one happens to be right here, right now.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_115_deco_garde.name: Garden Variety Wooden Bucket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_115_deco_garde.description: A moderately helpful gardening tool. If you lack a wheelbarrow, this bucket could probably do the trick.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_117_deco_garde.name: Garden Variety Ceramic Bucket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_117_deco_garde.description: This porcelain vessel lacks any distinguishing marks. You could use it for yardwork or, well, anything else.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_121_deco_garde.name: Garden Variety Sprout Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_121_deco_garde.description: This array of small pots lets seeds grow undisturbed. You wouldn't need one if there weren't so many chapaas.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_124_deco_garde.name: Garden Variety Pickaxe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_124_deco_garde.description: It's hard to say whether you'll need a pickaxe for gardening, but it's sure nice to have one just in case.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_81_deco_flower.name: Rose Like a Dragon from a Wellspring Cloche
DA_ItemType_Decor_Generic_81_deco_flower.description: Many legends surround this mysterious rose that never wilts. Perhaps it is enchanted? Or blessed by the Dragon? Or maybe it's fake.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_01_furniture_be.name: Ravenwood Silk Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_01_furniture_be.description: Ever felt the need to faint dramatically onto a silken, four-poster bed? Careful thee not snore too loudly. 'Twill break the fragile ambiance.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_02_furniture_mi.name: Ravenwood Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_02_furniture_mi.description: Some mirrors be enchanted to cause trouble. Dare not stare too long into this one lest ye be trapped in the forest of your own mind.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_03_furniture_co.name: Ravenwood Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_03_furniture_co.description: No house may call itself noble without a sitting room sumptuously arrayed in these fine couches.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_05_furniture_wa.name: Ravenwood Wall Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_05_furniture_wa.description: Feeling jinxed and need a little luck? Gaze unto this mirror, and let thy confidence return a thousandfold. Thou art now invincible!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_06_furniture_fl.name: Ravenwood Flower Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_06_furniture_fl.description: Install one of these wooden babies above your stove to give you all the extra space for your favorite pots. Just an arm's strech away.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_07_furniture_di.name: Ravenwood Large End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_07_furniture_di.description: Should other end tables not be grand enough, feast thine eyes on this mightier specimen.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_08_furniture_sp.name: Ravenwood Spotlight Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_08_furniture_sp.description: For ye heroes bold enough to brave the dark, take this brightest of spotlights to guide thee home amidst the cursed night!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_09_furniture_ch.name: Ravenwood Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_09_furniture_ch.description: If ye who be lost amongst the furtive trees of doubt, let this elegant chandelier illuminate the bigger picture and return hope to thee.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_10_furniture_pe.name: Ravenwood Hanging Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_10_furniture_pe.description: This unique, rectangular hanging lamp does cast its luminescent rays over a massive area. Everything the light touches be thine realm.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_11_furniture_wa.name: Ravenwood Wall Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_11_furniture_wa.description: Although the top of this lamp doth resemble a witch's hat, it hath no intention to curse you. Yet.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_12_furniture_ca.name: Ravenwood Candelabra
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_12_furniture_ca.description: A candelabra one may carry on haunted nights, or for those seeking to do a little haunting themselves.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_13_furniture_pi.name: Ravenwood Large Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_13_furniture_pi.description: Night in Palia often be a calm and restful time. But should ye wander, seek the double moons and navigate by their silvery glow.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_14_furniture_pi.name: Ravenwood Medium Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_14_furniture_pi.description: One of Palia's most long-standing theatrical works describes how a duke betrayed the Dragon, so the woods came and swallowed him up.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_15_furniture_pi.name: Ravenwood Small Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_15_furniture_pi.description: In this picture, a lone windmill stands bravely against the ominous dark. Or maybe 'twas just taken at night.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_17_furniture_ru.name: Ravenwood Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_17_furniture_ru.description: Let thine eye meander across the intricate designs of this runner, and thou shalt feel the same mysterious atmosphere of a misty wood.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_18_furniture_ru.name: Ravenwood Doormat
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_18_furniture_ru.description: Place this half-moon doormat against a wall, and thy guests will nary realize 'tis not a full circle.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_19_furniture_di.name: Ravenwood Console Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_19_furniture_di.description: Should this console stable grace your entry, ye shall have place for key, coin, and mysterious envelopes.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_20_furniture_ba.name: Ravenwood Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_20_furniture_ba.description: Do others claim ye be an unwashed forest creature? Fear not! One tryst with this goodly bath thud, and thou shalt no longer stink of the bush.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_21_furniture_ni.name: Ravenwood Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_21_furniture_ni.description: This nightstand be the perfect home for many secrets, such as thine diary with all its romantic daydreams.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_22_furniture_wa.name: Ravenwood Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_22_furniture_wa.description: This wardrobe doth suit Jel and his ilk best, for what is romance without a new outfit every morning?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_23_furniture_la.name: Ravenwood Small End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_23_furniture_la.description: The night is dark and full of terrors, but worry not! For when thy candle burn low, this end table hath three!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_26_furniture_sh.name: Ravenwood Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_26_furniture_sh.description: This shelf takes the ravishing, floral, form of a half a quatrefoil. One might even call it a ... duofoil?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_27_furniture_wa.name: Ravenwood Wall Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_27_furniture_wa.description: Hear ye! Hear ye! The wall clock doth strike! It is high time to come out and make yourself known, for an exciting day awaits thee.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_28_furniture_Co.name: Ravenwood Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_28_furniture_Co.description: Thou can own this luxurious chair fit for royalty, which is substantially preferable to being royalty.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_29_furniture_Di.name: Ravenwood Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_29_furniture_Di.description: This long, carved, dining table is equally well-suited to both dinners of romance and dinners of intrigue.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_30_furniture_Di.name: Ravenwood Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_30_furniture_Di.description: Dining at these finest of chairs is sure to impress even the pickiest of Palian peerage.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_31_furniture_St.name: Ravenwood Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_31_furniture_St.description: This elegant pantry is capable of storing all your libations, from liquor to love potions.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_32_furniture_ki.name: Ravenwood Floor Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_32_furniture_ki.description: For the clever peasant who desires elegance on a small budget, this floor cabinet doubles as a footstool.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_36_furniture_pa.name: Ravenwood Folding Screen
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_36_furniture_pa.description: This folding screen doth provide perfect cover for eavesdropping. Perhaps thy neighbors speak ill of you... or just on the weather.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_37_furniture_ou.name: Ravenwood Floor Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_37_furniture_ou.description: When wood begins to bore or simply doth not suffice, turn to this floor decor of stone. 'Tis sturdy underfoot and makes a much grander statement.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_38_furniture_ou.name: Ravenwood Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_38_furniture_ou.description: Once upon a midnight dreary, if ye ponder, weak and weary, ye need this lantern and nothing more.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_39_furniture_de.name: Ravenwood Vase
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_39_furniture_de.description: This solid vase forms a fine place for thine most precious flowers. But if ye haven't any, just say they be invisible.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_41_furniture_to.name: Ravenwood Toilet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_41_furniture_to.description: Should nature's call interrupt thee on a midsummer's night, this toilet will have ye back to cavorting in the woods in no time.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_42_furniture_ou.name: Ravenwood Standing Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_42_furniture_ou.description: These solemn standing lamps of blackest iron will lend an imposing air to your home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_43_furniture_wa.name: Ravenwood Wall Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Gothic_43_furniture_wa.description: If thou seeketh dishes for a moonlit, midnight, snack, look no further than this stately wall cabinet.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Tall Bottle
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: An elegant bottle with a slender neck. Its colored glass helps preserve light-sensitive liquids.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Thick Bottle
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A bottle made from colored glass. Its chunky shape means it can hold a surprising amount of liquid.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Small Bottle
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A small bottle made of clear glass, perfectly suited to modest amounts of liquid.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Large Pot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A large ceramic pot with a lid, ideal for soups and stews. It could contain anything!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Small Pot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A small ceramic pot with a lid, ideal for sauces. Keeps your dinner hot and the bugs out!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Casserole Dish
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A ceramic dish with handles ideal for, well... casseroles. Can be used both on the stove an in the oven.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Medium Jug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: Blowing over the opening produces a pleasant note. Collect multiple sizes to start a jug band!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Pitcher
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A ceramic container for liquids with a handle for easy pouring. Great for parties.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Carafe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A ceramic container that's like a pitcher, but without a handle. Careful not to drop it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Large Jug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: Blowing over the opening produces a low toot. Collect multiple sizes to start a jug band!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Small Jug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: Blowing over the opening produces a nifty whistle. Collect multiple sizes to start a jug band!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.name: Homestead Barrel
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Props_.description: A wooden cask for storing foodstuffs. Transporting them is sometimes known as "doing a barrel roll."

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Prop_M.name: Homestead Dress Form
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Ambient_Prop_M.description: An essential mannequin for those looking to make their own clothes... or just display their favorite outfits.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Cabinet_Storag.name: Homestead Sideboard
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Cabinet_Storag.description: No matter where you roam, you can return and store your souvenirs in this sturdy cabinet. It even has a display counter for your favorites.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Alarm_Clo.name: Homestead Alarm Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Alarm_Clo.description: Tired of pekis crowing at dawn? Get this alarm clock, and channel your rage at a bell instead of a bird!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Banner_Fl.name: Homestead Banner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Banner_Fl.description: Sweeten your home with flowers without inviting pollen allergies. This floral banner will bring a little bit of the outdoors to your indoors

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Candles.name: Homestead Candles
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Candles.description: A practical set of candles with a dish to catch any melting wax. Don't burn yourself!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Framed_Ar.name: Homestead Large Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Framed_Ar.description: A large painting depicting the Human ruins just outside Kilima Village. A picturesque reminder that you are always welcome here.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Framed_Ar.name: Homestead Medium Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Framed_Ar.description: A nicely-sized painting of one of the many windmills surrounding Kilima. There are certainly many like it, but this one is yours.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Framed_Ar.name: Homstead Small Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Framed_Ar.description: A framed painting of a picture-perfect Kilima home. But not your house specifically.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_L.name: Homestead Reed Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_L.description: Phoenixtail reeds are said to bring happiness to your life, so people keep dried ones around the house.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_L.name: Homestead Amphora
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_L.description: A large earthenware container that can store anything from flowers to foodstuffs.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_M.name: Homestead Tree Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_M.description: Most Palians keep plants in the house, but only the hardcore, like you, keep whole entire trees.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_S.name: Homestead Ficus Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_S.description: A sturdy plant said to bring wealth. Popular with Grimalkin, if they can resist ripping the leaves off.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_Y.name: Homestead Flower Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Planter_Y.description: Brighten up your day with a bouquet of flowers. Fresh blooms can be cut and turned into energizing herbal tea.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Pots_And_.name: Homestead Cookware
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Pots_And_.description: Hanging your pots and pans on the wall not only saves space, it makes you look like a professional chef.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Rect_.name: Homestead Medium Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Rect_.description: Add some personality to your flooring with this cozy rug. Soft enough to lie facedown on after you've had, you know, just one of those days.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Runne.name: Homestead Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Runne.description: This runner may look simple, but it gets its durability from two different types of woven fiber. Sure to stay good for many generations.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Small.name: Homestead Triangular Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Small.description: This unique rug is shaped like a triangle, making it somewhat difficult to find matching furniture.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Squar.name: Homestead Large Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Rug_Squar.description: Impress your neighbors and cover almost your entire floor in one go. Just get this massive rug. After all, you only live once.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_String_In.name: Homestead Lute
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_String_In.description: Traveling bards are great, but even Tarkaa can't be everywhere at once. You might as well learn the lute, too.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_TeaSet.name: Homestead Tea Set
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_TeaSet.description: With this stoneware teapot and matching cups, you can share a serene steep with your friends.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Wall_Cloc.name: Homestead Wall Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Wall_Cloc.description: A charming wall clock that tells time using the swinging pendulum inside. May or may not contain a cuckoo.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Wreath_La.name: Homestead Harvest Wreath
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Deco_Wreath_La.description: Shafts of wheat are considered a gift from Maji and can be hung on the door to invite good health.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Bed_.name: Homestead Medium Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Bed_.description: Lay down and take a well-deserved rest after a long day. You've put in so much hard work, and your home looks great. Be proud of yourself.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Benc.name: Homestead Small Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Benc.description: A backless wooden bench that can also double as a low table. Works well in any room!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Book.name: Homestead Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Book.description: A sturdy wooden bookshelf that can hold an entire library for even the most voracious reader.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Cabi.name: Homestead Small Dresser
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Cabi.description: A practical dresser that can store all your personal items without taking up too much space.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Chai.name: Homestead Cozy Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Chai.description: The carpenter made painstaking effort to maintain the shape of this chair, which was carved from a single tree.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Chai.name: Homestead Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Chai.description: Hard wood transforms into a comfy armchair under the deft hand of an experienced carpenter.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Coff.name: Homestead Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Coff.description: A low, wooden table large enough to fit all your friends when it's time for board or card games.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Disp.name: Homestead Display Case
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Disp.description: This wood cabinet is equipped with perfectly polished panes of glass that will protect your most prized possession from purloining.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Disp.name: Homestead Candle Holder
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Disp.description: A small, metal lantern frame meant for candles, but nothing stopping you from using something else.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Dres.name: Homestead Large Dresser
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Dres.description: A dresser large enough to hold all your belongs and then some. Sleep on top of it if you don't have a bed!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_End_.name: Homestead End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_End_.description: A simple, wooden, side table for adults. Or a fancy, full-sized, table for children.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Large Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: A large bench with a carved backrest. Like a hard couch that you don't have to clean as often.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Icebox
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: This icebox will theoretically keep food fresh for longer. But Delaila says Nai'o and Auni eat so much, she hasn't been able to test that claim.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: A simple, wooden dining chair. Honestly, you'll probably want more than one.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: A large table where the whole family can gather round for a healthy meal. Or less healthy gossip.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Floor Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: A true kitchen essential. Everyone needs a place to put their measuring spoons. It's just so. Many. Spoons.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: Protect and store your dry goods in this large pantry. Or your alchemical ingredients. We won't tell.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Wall Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: Just like a floor cabinet, but on the wall! Try not to place it out of reach, or you'll sorely regret it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.name: Homestead Wastebasket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Kitc.description: A stylish place for all your rubbish. Complete with lid, so you don't even have to smell it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Mirr.name: Homestead Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Mirr.description: Look great and feel great every day by making yourself up in front of this charming mirror. Love your home, love yourself!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Nigh.name: Homestead Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Nigh.description: A convenient, wooden, nightstand that lets you keep stuff near your bed. May make it more difficult to get up.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Shel.name: Homestead Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Shel.description: A wooden shelf that can be attached to a wall. For displaying plants, trophies, or other items of bragging.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Stoo.name: Homestead Stool
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Stoo.description: A practical, wooden stool. Stand on it? Sit on it? Throw it across a field? The possibilities are infinite!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Ward.name: Homestead Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Furniture_Ward.description: This wooden wardrobe lets you store and change your clothing. A must-have for every fashionable Palian.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Fixtu.name: Homestead Wall Lamp
