DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Fixtu.description: A harvest themed wall laA round lamp that attaches to a wall. Feel your soul soothed as you bathe in its soft, moonlit, glow.mp.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.name: Homestead Ceiling Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.description: A decorative ceiling lamp that makes a great statement piece. Its bright light will attract lots of visitors. Hopefully not too many are bugs.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.name: Homestead Medium Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.description: A round lamp with a soft glow that feels like carrying a solar system between your palms.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.name: Homestead Small Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.description: A round lamp with a soft glow that feels like carrying a star between your palms.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.name: Homestead Large Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Hangi.description: A round lamp with a soft glow that feels like carrying a galaxy between your palms.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Lamp_.name: Homestead Standing Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Lamp_.description: If you ever feel lost, just seek the guiding light of this lamp that never goes dim. It may be just a lamp, but it's looking out for you best as it can.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Lamp_.name: Homestead Desk Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Harvest_Lighting_Lamp_.description: Desk job got you down? Be enlightened by the intelligent glow of this whimsical lamp.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_01_furniture_.name: Industrial Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_01_furniture_.description: A leather couch that combines wood and steel to give your home that contemporary urban air.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_02_furniture_.name: Industrial Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_02_furniture_.description: This hardwood table is sanded to a silky finish! Have your friends over for coffee, but make them use coasters.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_03_furniture_.name: Industrial Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_03_furniture_.description: Have friends stopping by all the time? This large, durable rug can stand up to all their footsteps, spills, and melodramatic stories.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_04_furniture_.name: Industrial Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_04_furniture_.description: Wouldn't you want to showcase your mineral collection on this etagere bookcase? Hodari would be so proud!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_05_furniture_.name: Industrial Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_05_furniture_.description: A shelf made with the most durable steel in Kilima. So strong, you can even use it as pull-up bar!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_06_furniture_.name: Industrial Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_06_furniture_.description: Modern yet rustic. The urban design of this armchair will give your home that laid-back-yet-sophisticated-look.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_07_furniture_.name: Industrial Dresser
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_07_furniture_.description: This dresser combines tradition with modernity for the casual homeowner seeking just the essentials.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_08_furniture_.name: Industrial Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_08_furniture_.description: The rustic design of this nightstand is simple, yet stylish enough to match it with any bedroom set.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_09_furniture_.name: Industrial Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_09_furniture_.description: No more space? This jumbo wardrobe can even fit those clothes you got on clearance last year.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_10_furniture_.name: Industrial Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_10_furniture_.description: This deceptively simple runner is woven from the toughest fibers in Palia. It can do it all, and it certainly looks like it has seen it all, too.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_11_furniture_.name: Industrial Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_11_furniture_.description: Been sleeping somewhere cold? Save yourself from the dark with a restful night in this warm bed. It'll bring you to life!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_12_deco_large.name: Industrial Wall Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_12_deco_large.description: No better way to support Kilima artists than by displaying this handmade, steel sculpture in your home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_13_deco_plant.name: Industrial Ficus Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_13_deco_plant.description: Now if only your home had large, windowed walls to give this modern planter the sun it deserves.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_14_deco_pictu.name: Industrial Picture Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_14_deco_pictu.description: There were many possible frames competing for this floral painting. But when you think about it, this sturdy mount was the only choice, really.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_15_lighting_c.name: Industrial Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_15_lighting_c.description: This chandelier hangs on a twisted rope cord. If you spun it hard enough, you could probably unravel it. Look at it turn, turn, turn!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_16_lighting_l.name: Industrial Wall Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_16_lighting_l.description: Live an artist fantasy by adding this lamp to your wall. You can already feel the bulb flickering at night.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_17_furniture_.name: Industrial Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_17_furniture_.description: Simple and essential. The great thing about these wooden chairs is that they're easy to replace.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_18_furniture_.name: Industrial Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_18_furniture_.description: A gorgeous table of handcrafted wood brings the fresh scent of hardwood to your home. Aww, nature!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_19_furniture_.name: Industrial Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_19_furniture_.description: Install one of these wooden babies above your stove to give you all the extra space for your favorite pots. Just an arms strech away.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_20_furniture_.name: Industrial Sink
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_20_furniture_.description: Got dirty problems a regular sink can't handle? Plumehounds? Ormuus? Children? This professional-grade model solves them all!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_21_furniture_.name: Industrial Kitchen Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_21_furniture_.description: Impress your guests by displaying all you beautiful, locally-made, china in this handcrafted pantry.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_22_furniture_.name: Industrial Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_22_furniture_.description: If you can only commit to one bathtub, you can bet all your money on this one. Its metal and ceramic fixtures are sure to last for years!

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_23_furniture_.name: Industrial Small Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_23_furniture_.description: Its design is simple, but stepping on the wool weave of this modern rug feels so nice on your bare feet.

DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_24_furniture_.name: Industrial Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_ironwood_24_furniture_.description: Got business to take care of? Be galvanised by this mirror's stalwart design which hearkens to the prototypes of Palia's first inventors.

DA_ItemType_Decor_log_16_furniture_hangi.name: Log Cabin Wall Torch
DA_ItemType_Decor_log_16_furniture_hangi.description: Sometimes, you don't want to carry a live flame around. With this mounted torch, the wall can do that for you!

DA_ItemType_Decor_log_17_furniture_small.name: Log Cabin Small Torch
DA_ItemType_Decor_log_17_furniture_small.description: It's been lit a number of times before, but there has to be a little bit left to this torch. There's gotta! It's still good!

DA_ItemType_Decor_log_18_furniture_wall_.name: Log Cabin Large Torch
DA_ItemType_Decor_log_18_furniture_wall_.description: A tall, standing, torch with a bright flame. You may want a few, just in case the power goes out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_01.name: Log Cabin Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_01.description: Ever get frustrated with fishing? Turn your tackle bag into a planter. When the first leaves sprout, you'll finally be rolling on the floor with happiness.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Branch_On_The.name: Log Cabin Wall Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Branch_On_The.description: Be one with nature and hang this branch on your wall. The most environmentally-friendly decor in Palia!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Log_Stand.name: Log Cabin Log Carrier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Log_Stand.description: This log carrier commits fully to the cause and will gladly offer itself up if you run out of firewood.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Rug_01.name: Log Cabin Patterned Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Rug_01.description: The pattern may look complicated, but setting up this warm rug is easy. Just unfurl it on the floor, and bam! Instant cabin coziness.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Rug_02.name: Log Cabin Haabeko Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Deco_Rug_02.description: Although they're related, haabekos are said to be ten times stronger than ormuus, enough to lift a house!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Bed.name: Log Cabin Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Bed.description: Don't let its rough-hewn frame deceive you. This bed's mattress is so soft, you'll never want to move! Good luck getting up in the morning.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Bed_Benc.name: Log Cabin Small Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Bed_Benc.description: A simple wooden bench. If you put two together, you get a coffee table. With a crack in the middle.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Bookshel.name: Log Cabin Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Bookshel.description: A wooden bookshelf that looks strangely good with math texts. So, about them differential equations...

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Chair_Co.name: Log Cabin Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Chair_Co.description: Doesn't this cozy armchair make you want to sit down, sink into it, and release a big breath of air?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Coffee_T.name: Log Cabin Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Coffee_T.description: This coffee table is an essential foundation for anyone seeking to build a six-tier house of cards.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Couch.name: Log Cabin Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Couch.description: This couch is the perfect place to sit down, not move, and watch the world go by. Relax and take it all in, as nature intended. Even if it's only 9AM.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Dining_C.name: Log Cabin Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Dining_C.description: Heads up, if several of these chairs are occupied, you might be in the middle of a party!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Dining_T.name: Log Cabin Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Dining_T.description: This dining table fits four comfortably, but you should invite all your friends anyway! All of them.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Kitchen_.name: Log Cabin Wall Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Kitchen_.description: The doors on cabinet rattle whenever children search it for a midnight snack. Or maybe it's ghosts.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Nightsta.name: Log Cabin Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Nightsta.description: This nightstand is a handy location to put a glass of water in case you want to make a mess at night.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Partitio.name: Log Cabin Folding Screen
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Partitio.description: A partition of painted wood. Put it inside, it's a folding screen. Put it outside, it's a fence!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Storage_.name: Log Cabin Sideboard
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Storage_.description: A modest cabinet perfect for storing your belongings or adding a touch of the countryside to your home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Wall_Clo.name: Log Cabin Wall Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Wall_Clo.description: Don't be fooled by its wooden face, this wall clock likes to hang loose, man!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Wall_She.name: Log Cabin Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Wall_She.description: A mounted shelf resembling a tiny bench. What are shelves if not chairs for precious knick knacks?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Wardrobe.name: Log Cabin Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Furniture_Wardrobe.description: Tuck your clothes safely away in this wardrobe, which unfortunately isn't a walk-in one. Unless...?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Lighting_Hanging_L.name: Log Cabin Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Lighting_Hanging_L.description: You're probably spending too much time plugged into your work. Come to the cabin, turn on this light, and disconnect for awhile.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Lighting_Lamp_Ligh.name: Log Cabin Standing Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Lighting_Lamp_Ligh.description: The glow of this standing lamp is sure to ward the spooky shadows from every corner of your home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Lighting_Wall_Ligh.name: Log Cabin Wall Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Lighting_Wall_Ligh.description: Brighten up your space with this mounted lamp, which offers both light and coziness to any room.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Bench.name: Log Cabin Large Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Bench.description: This wooden bench offers the perfect spot for you and your visitors to rest your feet and enjoy the breeze.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Deco_01.name: Log Cabin Short Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Deco_01.description: This decorative lamp will illuminate even the darkest of nights, enchanting evening visitors right to your doorstep.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence.name: Log Cabin Fence
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence.description: Need to set better boundaries? There's no better way than with this wooden fence!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence_Colu.name: Log Cabin Outdoor Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence_Colu.description: Yard looking a little drab? Try this outdoor lamp, which is designed to brighten up even the simplest fencing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence_Doub.name: Log Cabin Double Gate
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence_Doub.description: This gate lets you re-enact every dramatic scene where a character pushes open a giant pair of doors.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence_Gate.name: Log Cabin Swing Gate
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Fence_Gate.description: This simple, wood, gate isn't exactly secure, but its creaky hinges will at least warn you of surprise visitors.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Wooden_Log.name: Log Cabin Garden Sernuk
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Wooden_Log.description: A hand-whittled sernuk statue. Look, a lumberjack's gotta have a little fun every now and then, okay?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Wooden_Sto.name: Log Cabin Stool
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Wooden_Sto.description: This wooden stool is a good project to learn woodworking. Sit on it while you learn how to make a real chair.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Wooden_Stu.name: Log Cabin Stump Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Log_Outdoor_Wooden_Stu.description: To make this chair, someone scooped all the wood out of a huge stump. Hopefully they had a very big spoon.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_44_deco_mochi.name: Maji Market Woven Basket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_44_deco_mochi.description: A lightweight basket made from woven strips of bamboo. Could theoretically double as a very large steamer.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_45_deco_mochi.name: Maji Market Veggie Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_Cosmetic_45_deco_mochi.description: Assortment of paper lanterns shaped like crops. Caution: may convince impressionable people that vegetables are too cute to eat.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_01_furnitur.name: Maji Market Folding Screen
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_01_furnitur.description: A delicate room divider made from transluscent paper, inspired by the shadow puppet plays that were once popular at Maji Market.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_02_deco_Pho.name: Chapaa Hut Embra Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_02_deco_Pho.description: Inspire a budding historian with this bright plushie of Embra, the Phoenix! Sure to keep you warm at night.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_03_deco_Dra.name: Chapaa Hut Maji Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_03_deco_Dra.description: Bless your home with this cozy plushie of Maji, the Dragon! Be soothed by its soft presence.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_04_deco_Pos.name: Maji Market Moon Banner
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_04_deco_Pos.description: A banner that commemerates the Maji Market. So transcendently beautiful, your friends will think you hung the moons!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_05_deco_Fan.name: Maji Market Dragon Fan
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_05_deco_Fan.description: An elegant wall fan that sparkles like the night sky, a type of decoration that dates back to the nobility before the Palian Republic.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_06_deco_Maj.name: Maji Market Hourglass Drum
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_06_deco_Maj.description: An hourglass drum that can be played with a mallet or your hands. The different sides represent different elements coexisting in harmony.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_07_deco_Flo.name: Maji Market Bloom Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_07_deco_Flo.description: When plants absorb Flow-infused water, they often begin to glow. They can then be harvested to make organic lanterns.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_08_deco_Spi.name: Maji Market Springblossom Vase
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_08_deco_Spi.description: These Palian trees only blossom for a few weeks in spring, but branches can last much longer inside with a little love and care.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_10_deco_Bal.name: Chapaa Hut Chapaalloon
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_10_deco_Bal.description: An inflatable, disembodied chapaa head that everyone is sure to love! Especially children.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_11_deco_Ska.name: Chapaa Hut Bahari Board
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_11_deco_Ska.description: Blast down the beach fast as a chapaa on your busted new Bahari Board. Perfect for rebellious teens and those seeking to reclaim their youth.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_14_outdoor_.name: Maji Market Cart
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_14_outdoor_.description: Show off your entrepreneurial spirit with your very own Maji Market cart! If Kenli can run a chapaa petting zoo, then you, too, can sell anything.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_15_outdoor_.name: Maji Market Arch
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_15_outdoor_.description: Welcome visitors with this lantern-lit archway. Your neighbors will be jealous that they have ordinary doors that actually require opening.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_20_outdoor_.name: Maji Market Chapaa Standee
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_20_outdoor_.description: Have you ever wanted to make believe that you're an invasive species? Now you can!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_21_outdoor_.name: Maji Market Ormuu Standee
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_21_outdoor_.description: If you're too afraid to take your picture with a real ormuu, you can use this standee to recreate the experience. 100% manure free!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.name: Chapaa Hut Inki Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.description: Bring Inki, the mischevious chapaa, home with you! Easier to care for than an actual chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.name: Chapaa Hut Naanshi Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.description: Bring Naanshi, the loving chapaa, home with you! Easier to care for than an actual chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.name: Chapaa Hut Nergaal Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.description: Bring Nergaal, the fiesty chapaa, home with you! Easier to care for than an actual chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.name: Chapaa Hut Enkii Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.description: Bring Enkii, the chapaa show-off, home with you! Easier to care for than an actual chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.name: Chapaa Hut Neena Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_27_ChapaaPl.description: Bring Neena, the thieving chapaa, home wit you! Easier to care for than an actual chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.name: Chapaa Hut Pillow
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.description: Can't pick a favorite chapaa? Take home this pillow, and you can pretend it's all of them at the same time.

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.name: Chapaa Hut Inki Pillow
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.description: A pillow modeled after the adventurous chapaa, Inki. Not great for your back, but it sure is cute!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.name: Chapaa Hut Naanshi Pillow
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.description: A pillow modeled after the hungry chapaa, Naanshi. Not great for your back, but it sure is cute!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.name: Chapaa Hut Nergaal Pillow
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.description: A pillow modeled after Nargaal, the chapaa who'll race you home. Not great for your back, but it sure is cute!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.name: Chapaa Hut Enkii Pillow
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.description: A pillow modeled after Enki with beautifully rendered tusks. Not great for your back, but it sure is cute!

DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.name: Chapaa Hut Neena Pillow
DA_ItemType_Decor_MajiMarket_28_PillowCh.description: A pillow modeled after the greedy chapaa, Neena. Not great for your back, but it sure is cute!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Birdbath.name: Makeshift Bird Bath
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Birdbath.description: A make-do birdbath deep enough to serve as a punch bowl. Kill two birdswith one stone.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Bread_And_Ja.name: Makeshift Charcuterie
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Bread_And_Ja.description: Leave bread on the counter, and it goes stale. Leave it even longer, and you have a decorative sculpture.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Clothes_Line.name: Makeshift Clothesline
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Clothes_Line.description: Air your dirty laundry on this DIY drying rack. Just don't let the neighbors find out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Coat_Rack.name: Makeshift Coat Rack
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Coat_Rack.description: Home is where you hang your hat, as they say. Or your jacket. Or your coat. Or your bag, for that matter.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Alarm_C.name: Makeshift Alarm Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Alarm_C.description: If you listen closely, the gears in this old clock are still turning. Now, if it only just had hands.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_A_Shelf.name: Makeshift Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_A_Shelf.description: A solid and sturdy shelf made of superior sapwood. It does its job well enough.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_B_Shutt.name: Makeshift WIndow Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_B_Shutt.description: Have a shutter that won't open? Tie a shelf to it, and marvel at your belongings' new wooden backdrop.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Cabinet.name: Makeshift Indoor Garden
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Cabinet.description: You're never too old for a new career! Be inspired by this enterprising cabinet that has acquired the new skills to become a beautiful garden.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Cearnuk.name: Makeshift Chopping Board
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Cearnuk.description: The garlic residue on this cutting board will give your food that nice pinch of flavor.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Cearnuk.name: Makeshift Sernuk Hide Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Cearnuk.description: The fine hairs on this handmade sernuk skin rug make it the quintessential Kilima decor.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chapaa_.name: Makeshift Chopping Block
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chapaa_.description: Chop your veggies on this chapaa-inspired cutting board. Perfect for any chapaa enthusiast.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chapaa_.name: Makeshift Chapaa Hide Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chapaa_.description: Real chapaa would be too small to make a good carpet, so someone made this scaled-up replica.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chappa_.name: Makeshift Chopping Block
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chappa_.description: Chop your veggies on this chapaa-inspired cutting board. Perfect for any chapaa enthusiast.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chappa_.name: Makeshift Chapaa Hide Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Chappa_.description: Real chapaa would be too small to make a good carpet, so someone made this scaled-up replica.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_C_Hangi.name: Makeshift Bucket Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_C_Hangi.description: Hone your floriculturist skills with this planter made out of old buckets from the mines. But don't let Hodari know.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_D_Wall_.name: Makeshift Small Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_D_Wall_.description: Store your knick-knacks in this small cabinet. Just don't pull too hard on the handle, or it'll come off.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Earwax_.name: Makeshift Thin Candle
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Earwax_.description: A small candle made out of earwax. Eww. Thank the Dragon it's not scented.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Earwax_.name: Makeshift Thick Candle
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Earwax_.description: This large candle will light up even the darkest mine in Bahari, but probably not for very long.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_E_Rake_.name: Makeshift Large Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_E_Rake_.description: The tongs on this rake will permit you to hang your plants with perfectly spaced positions.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Fish_Mo.name: Makeshift Cutting Board
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Fish_Mo.description: A small cutting board just big enough to fit an onion. Careful not to rub your eyes while using it..

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Framed_.name: Makeshift Porthole Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Framed_.description: A porthole picture frame with a pretty painting of the Wellspring crater. Maybe you'll get to go there one day. Every Palian does eventually.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Framed_.name: Makeshift Scenic Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Framed_.description: A scenic painting of a faraway place. The grass looks so real you could touch it. Hang this up, and you'll never need to leave the house again.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Framed_.name: Makeshift Small Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Framed_.description: This modest picture frame depicts a evening scene. It's a little spooky... and hopefully not haunted.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_F_Ladde.name: Makeshift Ladder
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_F_Ladde.description: The lovingly-placed decorations imply this ladder hasn't been used for awhile, but it sure looks nice.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Hanging.name: Makeshift Medium Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Hanging.description: A planter made from scraps found on your housing plot. The little guy could use a bit of sun...and water.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Hanging.name: Makeshift Hanging Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Hanging.description: The plant promises you an endless supply of fresh oxygen. The pot promises to hit you on the head.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Jug_Vas.name: Makeshift Flower Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Jug_Vas.description: A flower jug vase that gives your home that rustic touch reminiscent of your grandparents' farmhouse.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Kettle_.name: Makeshift Large Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Kettle_.description: Kettles with holes can no longer be used for water, but they can certainly be used for lamps!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Old_Sho.name: Makeshift Herb Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Old_Sho.description: Grow your own sweet leaf at home with this improvised planter. It conveniently has drainage holes.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Ormuu_M.name: Makeshift Window Shutter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Ormuu_M.description: Don't have a window? Just pretend! Tack any old piece of wood on the wall to make a convincing shutter. Just don't try to open it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Pots_An.name: Makeshift Cookware
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Pots_An.description: Nothing like the flavor of homemade sernuk noodle soup cooked in these vintage enamelware pots.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Pot_Pla.name: Makeshift Ficus Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Pot_Pla.description: This cute little planter is made out a burned, dented pot. Were you going through Reth's dumpster?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Rug_Rec.name: Makeshift Rectangular Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Rug_Rec.description: Want to protect your floor from scuff marks? This patchwork rug's got you covered. Look at all of those textures!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Rug_Squ.name: Makeshift Square Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Rug_Squ.description: This rug has been tasted and approved by the Bug in the Rug carpet company.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Sad_Tre.name: Makeshift Failed Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Sad_Tre.description: Liven up your living space with a touch of... whatever this plant is. Is it even alive?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Suitcas.name: Makeshift Chest
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Suitcas.description: The leather accents on this wooden coffer add an antique aesthetic. Did something move inside?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Suitcas.name: Makeshift Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Suitcas.description: Padding on this improvised nightstand make it the perfect for reading your little one a bedtime story.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Thistle.name: Makeshift Thistle Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Thistle.description: Show off your taste for chic with this crafty planter and a few books by your windowsill.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Ugly_Pl.name: Makeshift Succulent Pot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Ugly_Pl.description: Not much of a green thumb? Well, you're in luck! All these guys need is love.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wall_Cl.name: Makeshift Wall Clock
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wall_Cl.description: Always on the go? Can't stop for breakfast? Save time in the kitchen with your very own frying pan clock.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wall_Gr.name: Makeshift Small Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wall_Gr.description: Is it an old cheese grater or a new wall planter? Only one way to find out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wall_Gr.name: Makeshift Small Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wall_Gr.description: Is it an old cheese grater or a new wall planter? Only one way to find out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wood_Lo.name: Makeshift Log Carrier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wood_Lo.description: This lovely chap carries your logs for you so your arms don't get tired. Aww, how sweet!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wreath_.name: Makeshift Large Wreath
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Deco_Wreath_.description: A wreath made out rubbish makes the perfect housewarming gift. It's the thought that counts.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Fence.name: Makeshift Fence
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Fence.description: This fence could use a splash of paint, but it's enough to keep your nosy neighbors out if not chapaas.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Be.name: Makeshift Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Be.description: A dining chair that looks like a last-minute group project. It gets a passing grade.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Be.name: Makeshift Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Be.description: Sleeping on this bed might give you back pain and nightmares, but it's better than the floor!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Be.name: Makeshift Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Be.description: It's not exactly comfortable, but it's not exactly uncomfortable either, like most benches.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Bo.name: Makeshift Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Bo.description: Looking to get noticed? This bookshelf is sure to make a statement, but it might not be as flattering a message as you hope.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Co.name: Makeshift Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Co.description: Shabby and worn around the edges, but this coffee table keeps your food off the ground. Take that, ants!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Co.name: Makeshift Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Co.description: Barely a couch, with a rusty old spring popping out of the cushion. Use the backrest for free neck pain.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Di.name: Makeshift Large Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Di.description: A table made from an old door. Knock on it three times, and you'll hear a groan from the other side...

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Dr.name: Makeshift Dresser
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Dr.description: A short dresser fashioned from repurposed materials. Is that a spoon?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_En.name: Makeshift End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_En.description: Nothing like a flimsy nightstand to go beside your bed! If it wasn't for the flaky paint, it'd almost be cute.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.name: Makeshift Floor Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.description: This creaky cabinet will keep your belongings safe and sound, but certainly not snug.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.name: Makeshift Large Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.description: Fill your wall space with these shaky little guys, but better keep your fancy dishes somewhere else.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.name: Makeshift Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.description: Not chapaa-proof, bug-proof, or anything-proof for that matter, but hooray for pantry storage space!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.name: Makeshift Large Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ki.description: A surprisingly decent shelf to decorate your wall with. Careful not to hit your head on it!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_La.name: Makeshift Small Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_La.description: Never seen a leaning lamp before? Now you have! Brighten up your living space with this unconventional fellow.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_La.name: Makeshift Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_La.description: Fashioned with rough ropes and splintered wood, this armchair could double as an ancient torture device.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Mi.name: Makeshift Face Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Mi.description: Be careful what face you make in this mirror, because you might get stuck looking like that. Forever. That's right. Forever.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ni.name: Makeshift Drum Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Ni.description: A poor barrel lost its head so this table could be made. On the bright side, it's surprisingly sturdy.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Sh.name: Makeshift Short End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Sh.description: An end table but better. It has tiny handles! Pick the little guy up and put him somewhere nice. Definitely not a milk bucket. Nope.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Sh.name: Makeshift Small Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Sh.description: A small table with big dreams. Put something fancy on top of it, won't you?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Sm.name: Makeshift Round End Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Sm.description: She's not like the other end tables. She's made out of books! Don't read too hard into it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_St.name: Makeshift Stool
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_St.description: You can sit on this stool. That's about all it's good for. At least you can sit on it indoors or outdoors.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Wa.name: Makeshift Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Furniture_Wa.description: Stash your apparel in this wardrobe. Just don't crawl inside, or you might never find your way back out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lawn_Chair.name: Makeshift Lawn Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lawn_Chair.description: Reject tradition and embrace modernity with this lawn chair. You'll be an instant hit with the farmers!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lawn_Ornamen.name: Makeshift Garden Chapaa
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lawn_Ornamen.description: Tired of basic planters? This one's cute AND chapaa-shaped! Liven up your garden with one... or fifty of these. The more, the merrier!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lighting_Wal.name: Makeshift Candle Holder
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lighting_Wal.description: An inventive candle holder made out of an old ladle. Why scoop soup when you can scoop wax instead?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lighting_Wal.name: Makeshift Wall Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lighting_Wal.description: This lamp vaguely resembles a stooped figure. Hang it in the corner of a dark room, and you'll see it too.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lighting_Whe.name: Makeshift Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Lighting_Whe.description: Don't you dare underestimate this cobbled lamp. Despite its looks, it is sturdy and shines bright. Also it's mean to make fun of things.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Outhouse_Str.name: Makeshift Outhouse
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Outhouse_Str.description: No better place to handle business and contemplate life than this outhouse. Knock before you enter.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Pergola.name: Makeshift Pergola
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Pergola.description: This tilted pergola can still provide shaded respite on sunny afternoons. However, it may be significantly less effective when raining.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Picnic_Blank.name: Makeshift Picnic Blanket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Picnic_Blank.description: A patchwork picnic blanket, perfect for outdoor dates or quiet time in the sun... with the neighborhood insects.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Picnic_Table.name: Makeshift Picnic Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Picnic_Table.description: A staple of any Kilima garden. Have a barbecue on a sunny spring day with this traditional picnic table.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Sun_Umbrella.name: Makeshift Patio Umbrella
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Sun_Umbrella.description: Who cares about the rain when you can get a perfect view of the stars from under here?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Trash_Bin.name: Makeshift Wastebasket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Trash_Bin.description: Dispose of your waste in this basket like a proper Palian, or suffer the eternal consequences.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Trellus.name: Makeshift Trellis
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Trellus.description: Add verticality to your outdoor arrangements with this shoddy trellis, which just begs to be climbed.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Wagonwheel_D.name: Makeshift Garden Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Makeshift_Wagonwheel_D.description: A bucket forms the base of this flower bed. What other amazing possibilities await when you fill stuff with dirt?

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_01_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_01_furnitur.description: Lounge in luxury on this couch and its own set of stylish throw pillows. Your neighbors are sure to be jealous.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_02_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_02_furnitur.description: Nothing screams "Capital Chic" more than three tables in one. Looks like it belongs in the Akwinduu Art Museum.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_03_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Stylish Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_03_furnitur.description: Been looking everywhere for the perfect floor covering? Look no further! This stylish rug is obviously the only choice.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_04_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Large Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_04_furnitur.description: This handcrafted bookshelf is the perfect place for your most expensive souvenirs, the pretty ones anyway.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_05_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Shelves
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_05_furnitur.description: A minimalistic shelf suited for carrying your knick knacks or accenting the statement piece below it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_06_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Round Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_06_furnitur.description: You're looking slick today! See for yourself in this sleek, modern, mirror. Who's the most fashionable person in all of Palia? You are!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_07_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Fern Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_07_furnitur.description: Fern-ish your home with this stylish planter, which is sure to leaf your guests green with envy.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_08_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_08_furnitur.description: Let your wealthy clients relax in this cozy armchair, and you'll have a deal in no time.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_09_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_09_furnitur.description: A tiny but mighty nightstand to store your necessities in. You'll never have to leave your bed again!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_10_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_10_furnitur.description: For the foremost fashionistas, only the most stylish wardrobe can contain such stylish outfits.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_11_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_11_furnitur.description: Has your annoyingly gauche neighbor got new furniture again? Knock their ego down a peg by purchasing this gorgeous rug. Take that!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_12_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Small Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_12_furnitur.description: Cozy on the top, business on the bottom, this bookshelf is on a mission to get people talking.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_13_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_13_furnitur.description: This dapper bed is the perfect place to lie down and read some romantic stories. Don't worry, it won't tell anyone if you cry.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_14_deco_lar.name: Capital Chic Wall Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_14_deco_lar.description: This enchanting wall decor is bound to appear in your most delightful dreams... and your worst nightmares.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_15_deco_pla.name: Capital Chic Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_15_deco_pla.description: Never seen a planter with legs? Now you have! This sleek fellow is here to take a stand. With your plant.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_16_deco_pic.name: Capital Chic Field Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_16_deco_pic.description: Growing ever tired of your current surroundings? It's time to look towards greener grasses, like those in this exquisite picture!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_17_lighting.name: Capital Chic Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_17_lighting.description: This chandelier is cultured with a capital C! Happening with a capital H! Impressive with a capital I! ...and well, something with another C.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_18_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Table Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_18_furnitur.description: A fashionable table lamp with two times the bulbs, two times the light, and two times the style.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_19_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_19_furnitur.description: A posh dining chair that is as gentle on your butt as it is on your floorboards.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_20_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_20_furnitur.description: Dine like Palian royalty on this lavish dining table, cut from the highest quality stone in the Republic.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_21_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Wall Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_21_furnitur.description: This cabinet puts the C in 'classy,' storing housewares and offering you a hand towel when you need it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_22_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_22_furnitur.description: Sleep peacefully at night knowing this sturdy shelf is eagerly holding your most priceless belongings.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_23_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Kitchenette
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_23_furnitur.description: Which came first, the peki or the egg? Well, it doesn't matter when your chef has quit, now does it? So cook both at this stylish kitchenette!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_24_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_24_furnitur.description: This fancy fellow is eager to serve, whether as an addition to your kitchen or a centerpiece in a magic show.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_25_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_25_furnitur.description: An inconspicuous pantry to stow your deepest secrets in... or your indulgent midnight snacks.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_26_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_26_furnitur.description: Ugh, they're at again! You spent all this money on a relaxing, marble bath, and all they want to do is play in it. Children are so dreadful!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_26_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_26_furnitur.description: Ugh, they're at again! You spent all this money on a relaxing, marble bath, and all they want to do is play in it. Children are so dreadful!

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_27_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Sink
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_27_furnitur.description: Some days, life won't let you get your beauty sleep. But that's no matter with this lovely sink that'll prepare you even for the worst mornings.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_28_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Doormat
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_28_furnitur.description: A doormat with an intricately-woven pattern. Step on it, and be whisked away to a grander age.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_28_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Doormat
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_28_furnitur.description: A doormat with an intricately-woven pattern. Step on it, and be whisked away to a grander age.

DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_29_furnitur.name: Capital Chic Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_midcentury_29_furnitur.description: Getting ready for a new venture? This minimal mirror will lend you all the entrepreneurial spirit you need to seek that sweet, seed capital.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_100_Furnitur.name: Lucky Stew Pot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_100_Furnitur.description: Reth's lucky stew pot. Or rather, YOUR lucky stew pot now.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_101_Furnitur.name: Tamala's Beauty Cream
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_101_Furnitur.description: A vial of Tamala's signature beauty secret.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_102_Furnitur.name: Mechanical Chapaa
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_102_Furnitur.description: A mechanical chapaa made by Najuma.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_103_Furnitur.name: Lucky Riffroc Shoe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_103_Furnitur.description: An item that brings Nai'o good luck.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_146_Prop_Acc.name: Fall Acceptance Wreath
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_146_Prop_Acc.description: A wreath for those with an easy breezy personality. Received as a gift from Eshe during the Acceptance Ceremony.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_148_Prop_Swo.name: Sword Display
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_148_Prop_Swo.description: A master blade from Sifuu. Purely for decorative purposes.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_156_Prop_Sea.name: Short Enchanted Candle
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_156_Prop_Sea.description: A short candle meant to ward off otherworldly intruders. Great for sleepovers, seances, and dimly lit mineshafts.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_202_Furnitur.name: Tau Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_202_Furnitur.description: An adorable plush of everybody's favorite good boy.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_206_Furnitur.name: Ancient Fish Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_206_Furnitur.description: When you discover an ancient species, obviously you should create merchandise of it. Now everyone can enjoy their own fishy friend!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_215_Furnitur.name: Fish Constellation Chart
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_215_Furnitur.description: A star chart of the fish constellation you found in the water temple.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_21_Deco_Jar_.name: Jar of Shimmerflies
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_21_Deco_Jar_.description: A jar of shimmerflies, given to you by Auni to thank you for lifting his curse.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_25_Deco_Phoe.name: Phoenix Statue
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_25_Deco_Phoe.description: A statue of the Phoenix, given to you by Jina.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_39_Deco_Pott.name: Potted Briar Daisies
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_39_Deco_Pott.description: Briar Daisies raised personally by Kenyatta.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_44_Deco_Cust.name: Custom Sketch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_44_Deco_Cust.description: A custom sketch of Kenyatta's Bahari Ball dress.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_47_Deco_Fanc.name: Fancy Chest
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_47_Deco_Fanc.description: A fancy chest given to you by Tish

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_50_Deco_High.name: Grimalkin Rave Wand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_50_Deco_High.description: A "rave wand" that looks suspiciously like a laser pointer. Given to you by Zeki.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_51_Deco_Comm.name: Commemorative Plate
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_51_Deco_Comm.description: A commemorative plate, given to you by Eshe to celebrate your fantastic cooking skills.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_56_Deco_Gian.name: Giant Scissors
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_56_Deco_Gian.description: Giant scissors to cut giant ribbons. Given to you by Kenli.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_61_Deco_Farm.name: Spicerack
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_61_Deco_Farm.description: A rack for all your spices. Gifted to you by Delaila.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_62_Deco_Illu.name: Illuminated Manuscript
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_62_Deco_Illu.description: An illuminated manuscipt, given to you by Caleri.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_63_Deco_Moun.name: Replica Hoosit
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_63_Deco_Moun.description: A Hoosit... or maybe a Whatsit. Elouisa made it for you.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_68_Deco_Tele.name: Telescope
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_68_Deco_Tele.description: A telescope given to you by Chayne.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_79_Deco_Mud_.name: Mud Pie
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_79_Deco_Mud_.description: A gift from the mysterious blueberry lover.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_83_Deco_Sket.name: Sketch of a Whale
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_83_Deco_Sket.description: A sketch of the whale that is named after you.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_BahariMap.name: Bahari Bay Map
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_BahariMap.description: A treasured map rewarded to those who've mapped enough treasure.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_KilimaMap.name: Kilima Village Map
DA_ItemType_Decor_Narrative_KilimaMap.description: A treasured map rewarded to those who've mapped enough treasure.

DA_ItemType_Narrative_170_Furniture_Acce.name: Summer Acceptance Wreath
DA_ItemType_Narrative_170_Furniture_Acce.description: A wreath for those with a sunny personality. Received as a gift from Eshe during the Acceptance Ceremony.

DA_ItemType_Narrative_171_Furniture_Acce.name: Winter Acceptance Wreath
DA_ItemType_Narrative_171_Furniture_Acce.description: A wreath for those who are a little more grounded. Received as a gift from Eshe during the Acceptance Ceremony.

DA_ItemType_Narrative_172_Furniture_Acce.name: Spring Acceptance Wreath
DA_ItemType_Narrative_172_Furniture_Acce.description: A wreath for those whose thoughts run deep as the ocean. Received as a gift from Eshe during the Acceptance Ceremony.

DA_ItemType_Decor_AuniPortrait.name: Auni Portrait
DA_ItemType_Decor_AuniPortrait.description: A self portrait made by Auni.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Golem_Stone.name: Golem Stone
DA_ItemType_Decor_Golem_Stone.description: A decorative stone in the shape of a Golem, given to you by Einar.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Ashura.description: A portrait of Ashura to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Auni.description: A portrait of Auni to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Kenyatta.description: A portrait of Kenyatta to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Najuma.description: A portrait of Najuma to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Nyo.description: A portrait of Nai'o to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Reth.description: A portrait of Reth to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Sefu.description: A portrait of Sifuu to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Tamala.description: A portrait of Tamala to hang on your wall.
