DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Tish.description: A portrait of Tish to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Zeki.name: Zeki's Portrait
DA_ItemType_Decor_Portrait_Zeki.description: A portrait of Zeki to hang on your wall.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_External_01_Wi.name: Kilima Founder's Windmill Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_External_01_Wi.description: The founders of Kilima raised windmills in the fields to bring joy to villagers. Bring joy to your home by decorating your house with your own!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Referral_06_Hu.name: Finding Friends Chapaa Plush
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Referral_06_Hu.description: These hugging plushies are a symbol of friendship here in Palia. Who even knew that chapaas were such social creatures?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Referral_07_Ch.name: Finding Friends Chapaa Fountain
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Referral_07_Ch.description: Wow, you've got so many friends! Invite them all over to play in this beautiful fountain. If your friends are chapaas, that is.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_01_Bug_D.name: Kilima Bug Collector's Display Box
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_01_Bug_D.description: Nothing bugs you! Rewarded for catching all bug species in Kilima and Bahari.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_02_Bug_D.name: Star Kilima Bug Collector's Display Box
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_02_Bug_D.description: Un-bee-lieveable work! Rewarded for catching all star quality bug species in Kilima and Bahari.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_03_Forag.name: Kilima Forager's Basket
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_03_Forag.description: May the forest be with you! Rewarded for foraging many species in Kilima and Bahari.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_04_Mount.name: Kilima Hunter's Mounted Sernuk
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_04_Mount.description: Well, you certainly weren't bucking around! Rewarded for hunting all types of sernuks.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_05_Mount.name: Kilima Hunter's Mounted Chapaa
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_05_Mount.description: Here's an archery prize for you, no strings attached. Rewarded for hunting all types of chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_06_Mount.name: Kilima Fisher's Mounted Fish
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_06_Mount.description: Hope this doesn't seem too fishy. Rewarded for catching all fish species in Kilima and Bahari.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_07_Mount.name: Star Kilima Fisher's Mounted Fish
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_07_Mount.description: Well, aren't you just fintastic? Rewarded for catching all star quality fish species in Kilima and Bahari.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_08_Paliu.name: Kilima Miner's Tower of Palium
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rewards_Skill_08_Paliu.description: Power to the pebble! Rewarded for mining and crafting bars for all mineral types in Kilima and Bahari.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_01_furniture_co.name: Ranch House Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_01_furniture_co.description: Call this couch whatever you want. You can't hurt its feelings. Its hide is thick as leather!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_02_furniture_co.name: Ranch House Coffee Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_02_furniture_co.description: The more you stare at it, the more you'll realize this coffee table isn't a perfect square.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_03_furniture_ru.name: Ranch House 99-Acre Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_03_furniture_ru.description: Some people have 99 problems, but this rug feels like 99 acres of comfy, high-pile territory. So come on down and lounge. Bring snacks!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_04_furniture_bo.name: Ranch House Bookshelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_04_furniture_bo.description: Finally! A bookshelf for all those almanacs! The ones from ten years ago'll come in handy someday.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_05_furniture_sh.name: Ranch House Wall Shelf
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_05_furniture_sh.description: This rustic shelf is a great place to hold jam jars. But it does have a limit. A hundred might be too many.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_06_furniture_co.name: Ranch House Armchair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_06_furniture_co.description: When the kids finally go to bed, you can lounge in this armchair and milk your evening freedom for all it's worth.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_07_furniture_dr.name: Ranch House Floor Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_07_furniture_dr.description: No two drawers on this floor cabinet are the same size. What? It's a feature, not an accident!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_08_furniture_ni.name: Ranch House Nightstand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_08_furniture_ni.description: It's way pasture bedtime, so put everything away into this nightstand before you lie down to sleep.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_09_furniture_wa.name: Ranch House Wardrobe
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_09_furniture_wa.description: Change into work clothes with this handy wardrobe. But just how many overalls does one person need?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_10_furniture_ru.name: Ranch House Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_10_furniture_ru.description: This bodacious bovine shaped rug is warm, fluffy, and ready to greet you and all your visitors. Don't have a cow, man!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_11_furniture_be.name: Ranch House Bed
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_11_furniture_be.description: No matter what's happening in the wider world, this bed'll wait for you. It'll be there whenever you wanna come on back home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_13_deco_planter.name: Ranch House Veggie Pot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_13_deco_planter.description: Why not use planter for vegetables? You can't even eat flowers! Well, unless you're an ormuu.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_14_deco_picture.name: Ranch House Wall Decor
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_14_deco_picture.description: You can imagine this rustic wall decor once held a beautiful painting of a valley, but it's not there now, almost as if someone's hidden it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_15_lighting_cha.name: Ranch House Chandelier
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_15_lighting_cha.description: This handmade chandelier's classic design feels like home. This fella'll always welcome you back, no matter how long you've been away

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_16_lighting_lam.name: Ranch House Table Lamp
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_16_lighting_lam.description: The light from this udderly adorable little lamp is sure to steer you in the right direction.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_17_furniture_di.name: Ranch House Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_17_furniture_di.description: This wooden chair is built to stand up to anything, even a rambunctious Bug Scout who's always on the moo-ve.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_18_furniture_di.name: Ranch House Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_18_furniture_di.description: Nuthin' says fun for the whole family like the dinner bell! Everyone can fit at this here dining table.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_19_furniture_ki.name: Ranch House Wall Cabinet
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_19_furniture_ki.description: This hanging cabinet has a place for everything, and everything in its place. You kitchen'll want for nothing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_20_furniture_ki.name: Ranch House Sink
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_20_furniture_ki.description: This sink gets up as early as you do, and it's just waiting to help you wash your face, brush your teeth, and... you also get dressed at the sink, right?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_21_furniture_ki.name: Ranch House Pantry
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_21_furniture_ki.description: A rancher never lets a friend go hungry. This pantry's crammed full with a taste of Palian hospitality!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_22_furniture_ba.name: Ranch House Bathtub
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_22_furniture_ba.description: This bath tub certainly looks expensive! Your friends'll be asking you if you had to mortgage the whole farm just to buy it.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_23_furniture_ba.name: Ranch House Doormat
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_23_furniture_ba.description: Don't have an ormuu, man! This doormat'ill wipe all that ranch dirt off your feet. At least, it'll try to.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_24_furniture_ba.name: Ranch House Mirror
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_24_furniture_ba.description: This mirror thinks you're sweet as candy, and downright loves to see you gussied up to step out for the day. But y'all come on back now, y'hear?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_25_furniture_ou.name: Ranch House Flower Pot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_25_furniture_ou.description: Any good rancher knows how to make do in a tight situation. This planter'll make your friends think you never broke that wheelbarrow.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_26_furniture_ou.name: Ranch House Fountain
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_26_furniture_ou.description: Every farm needs a well. This fountain lets you pump your own water whenever your ormuu need a refill.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_27_furniture_ou.name: Ranch House Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_27_furniture_ou.description: The wooden bench is basically a couch with no padding, so you can even use it outdoors!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_28_deco_plush.name: Ranch House Cherrytail
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_28_deco_plush.description: A plush based on Cherrytail, the feisty ormuu. The bell alerts Nai'o to when she's gotten into trouble.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_29_Deco_Plush_b.name: Ranch House Butterball
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_29_Deco_Plush_b.description: A plush based on Butterball, Nai'o's favorite prize-winning ormuu. She even dresses like him!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_30_Deco_Plush_c.name: Ranch House Cottonbean
DA_ItemType_Decor_Rustic_30_Deco_Plush_c.description: A plush based on Cottonbean, the shy ormuu. The overalls are hiding her bad fur day. How embarrassing!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Sandbox_Wooden_Box.name: Wooden Box
DA_ItemType_Decor_Sandbox_Wooden_Box.description: A simple 1 meter sized wooden box.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Sandbox_Wooden_Ramp.name: Wooden Box
DA_ItemType_Decor_Sandbox_Wooden_Ramp.description: A simple 1 meter sized wooden box.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Sandbox_Wooden_Wall_Cl.name: Wooden Climbing Wall
DA_ItemType_Decor_Sandbox_Wooden_Wall_Cl.description: A simple wooden wall for climbing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_01_fishing_deco_.name: Fisher's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_01_fishing_deco_.description: This plaque certainly certifies that you are a big fish in a small village.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_02_fishing_deco_.name: Fisher's Treasure Chest
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_02_fishing_deco_.description: One person's trash is a fisher's treasure. And hey, look what you've caught!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_03_fishing_deco_.name: Fisher's Aquarium
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_03_fishing_deco_.description: There's plenty of fish in the sea, and you can keep them all in this fancy aquarium.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_08_bug_catching_.name: Bug Catcher's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_08_bug_catching_.description: This plaque proves you're good at catching bugs, and that's better than catching colds!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_09_bug_catching_.name: Bug Catcher's Lure
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_09_bug_catching_.description: Bugs don't bug you! In You can even set out this glowing lure to tell them you want to be friends.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_10_bug_catching_.name: Bug Catcher's Insectarium
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_10_bug_catching_.description: With this insectarium, your whole collection will be snug as a bug in a... tank.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_15_furniture_mak.name: Furniture Maker's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_15_furniture_mak.description: A bad carpenter blames their tools. A good carpenter gets this plaque.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_16_furniture_mak.name: Furniture Maker's Tool Chest
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_16_furniture_mak.description: Need another tool in the toolbox? What about just a whole 'nother toolbox instead?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_17_furniture_mak.name: Furniture Maker's Drawing Board
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_17_furniture_mak.description: You don't need to go back to the drawing board. It's right here for all your best-laid plans.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_22_cooking_deco_.name: Cook's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_22_cooking_deco_.description: Too many cooks in the kitchen? This plaque proves that they only need one: you!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_23_cooking_deco_.name: Cook's Trays
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_23_cooking_deco_.description: No one can dish out the dishes like you can. Display them on this handy stand!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_24_cooking_deco_.name: Cook's Market Stand
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_24_cooking_deco_.description: If you can't stand standing around, you could always open a street food stall with this market stand.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_29_gardening_dec.name: Gardener's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_29_gardening_dec.description: This plaque signifies those who've chosen to take the garden path.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_30_gardening_dec.name: Gardener's Cornucopia
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_30_gardening_dec.description: Who needs a fruit basket when you can show your harvest off in a whole cornucopia?

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_31_gardening_dec.name: Gardener's Growhouse
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_31_gardening_dec.description: Great oaks grow from little acorns, but anything grows in this greenhouse.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_36_hunting_deco_.name: Hunter's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_36_hunting_deco_.description: This spiffy plaque proves you hit all the targets you aim for, even the moving ones.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_37_hunting_deco_.name: Hunter's Target
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_37_hunting_deco_.description: If you have more arrows left your quiver, feel free to try them out on this home target!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_38_hunting_deco_.name: Hunter's Mannequin
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_38_hunting_deco_.description: Bring home the energy of the hunt with this antlered mannequin. Real sernuks move, though.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_43_foraging_deco.name: Forager's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_43_foraging_deco.description: If every forager could, they wood certainly get themselves this plaque.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_44_foraging_deco.name: Forager's Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_44_foraging_deco.description: After a long day of foraging, you can plant yourself in front of this unique planter.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_45_foraging_deco.name: Forager's Bonsai
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_45_foraging_deco.description: How much wood could you chuck, if you could chuck wood? A whole dang tree!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_50_mining_deco_t.name: Miner's Plaque
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_50_mining_deco_t.description: Mine? Mine? Mine? Mine? Mine? No, this plaque is definitely yours!

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_51_mining_deco_t.name: Miner's Anvil
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_51_mining_deco_t.description: You've hit the gold mine! WIth this anvil, you can turn any chunk of metal into anything you want.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_52_mining_deco_t.name: Miner's Curio Case
DA_ItemType_Decor_Skill_52_mining_deco_t.description: This case is great for your rock collection. What to put in here? Your guess is as good as mine.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_56_Bug_Catching.name: Bronze Bug Catching Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_56_Bug_Catching.description: Looks like you've worked out the bugs! Rewarded for reaching level 10 in bug catching.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_56_Bug_Catching.name: Silver Bug Catching Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_56_Bug_Catching.description: Aren't you buzzing with excitement? Rewarded for reaching level 25 in bug catching.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_57_Cooking_Tier.name: Bronze Cooking Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_57_Cooking_Tier.description: Orange you excited for this? Rewarded for reaching level 10 in cooking.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_57_Cooking_Tier.name: Silver Cooking Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_57_Cooking_Tier.description: What's cooking, good-looking? Rewarded for reaching level 25 in cooking.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_58_Fishing_Tier.name: Bronze Fishing Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_58_Fishing_Tier.description: Are you fishing for compliments? Rewarded for reaching level 10 in fishing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_58_Fishing_Tier.name: Silver Fishing Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_58_Fishing_Tier.description: Any fin is possible if you don't doubt yourself! Rewarded for reaching level 25 in fishing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_59_Foraging_Tie.name: Bronze Foraging Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_59_Foraging_Tie.description: Have you got an axe to grind? Rewarded for reaching level 10 in foraging.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_59_Foraging_Tie.name: Silver Foraging Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_59_Foraging_Tie.description: Looks like you're finally branching out! Rewarded for reaching level 25 in foraging.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_60_Furniture_Ma.name: Bronze Furniture Making Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_60_Furniture_Ma.description: Awl in awl, you're doing an excellent job. Rewarded for reaching level 10 in the Furniture Making skill.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_60_Furniture_Ma.name: Silver Furniture Making Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_60_Furniture_Ma.description: A trophy commemorating reaching level 25 in the Furniture Making skill.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_61_Gardening_Ti.name: Bronze Gardening Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_61_Gardening_Ti.description: Do you need some encourage-mint? Rewarded for reaching level 10 in gardening.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_61_Gardening_Ti.name: Silver Gardening Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_61_Gardening_Ti.description: Thistle look great on your shelf. Rewarded for reaching level 25 in gardening.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_62_Hunting_Tier.name: Bronze Hunting Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_62_Hunting_Tier.description: Keep hunting! It's worth a shot! Rewarded for reaching level 10 in hunting.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_62_Hunting_Tier.name: Silver Hunting Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_62_Hunting_Tier.description: You aimed to improve, and you succeeded! Rewarded for reaching level 25 in hunting.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_63_Mining_Tier_.name: Bronze Mining Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_63_Mining_Tier_.description: It's a hard rock life for you, huh? Rewarded for reaching level 10 in mining.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_63_Mining_Tier_.name: Silver Mining Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_63_Mining_Tier_.description: Don't take your hard work for granite! Rewarded for reaching level 25 in mining.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_64_Bug_Catching.name: Gold Bug Catching Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_64_Bug_Catching.description: Guess you're pretty fly after all! Rewarded for reaching level 50 in bug catching.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_65_Cooking_Tier.name: Gold Cooking Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_65_Cooking_Tier.description: Nobody beets you in the kitchen! Rewarded for reaching level 50 in cooking.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_66_Fishing_Tier.name: Gold Fishing Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_66_Fishing_Tier.description: It doesn't get betta than this. Rewarded for reaching level 50 in fishing.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_67_Foraging_Tie.name: Gold Foraging Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_67_Foraging_Tie.description: The forest's got nothing on you. You're totally kick axe! Rewarded for reaching level 50 in foraging.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_68_Furniture_Ma.name: Gold Furniture Making Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_68_Furniture_Ma.description: You're the sharpest tool in the shed! Rewarded for reaching level 50 in the Furniture Making skill.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_69_Gardening_Ti.name: Gold Gardening Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_69_Gardening_Ti.description: You're certainly one in a melon! Rewarded for reaching level 50 in gardening.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_70_Hunting_Tier.name: Gold Hunting Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_70_Hunting_Tier.description: Folks better bow down to your bow skills. Rewarded for reaching level 50 in hunting.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_71_Mining_Tier_.name: Gold Mining Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_71_Mining_Tier_.description: Have your karat cake, and eat it, too! Rewarded for reaching level 50 in mining.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_MasterSocialChe.name: Pan Pals Master Cooking Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_MasterSocialChe.description: You're not cooking for one. You're cooking with everyone! Rewarded for cooking all recipes at star quality with friends.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_PlotValue_Tier_.name: Bronze Home Value Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_PlotValue_Tier_.description: You've started to make yourself at home. Rewarded for having a house with a fine property value.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_PlotValue_Tier_.name: Silver Home Value Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_PlotValue_Tier_.description: Well, you certainly got your house in order! Rewarded for having a house with an exquisite property value.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_PlotValue_Tier_.name: Gold Home Value Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_PlotValue_Tier_.description: There's no place like home. Especially yours! Rewarded for having a house with a superlative property value.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_SocialChef.name: Pan Pals Cooking Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_SocialChef.description: You're not cooking for one. You're cooking with everyone! Rewarded for cooking all recipes with friends.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_Writs_Tier_0.name: Bronze Plot Size Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_Writs_Tier_0.description: It's time to plot out the future of your house. Rewarded for having a housing plot of a fine size.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_Writs_Tier_1.name: Silver Plot Size Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_Writs_Tier_1.description: The plot thickens! Or maybe it just got bigger. Rewarded for having a housing plot of an exquisite size.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_Writs_Tier_2.name: Gold Plot Size Trophy
DA_ItemType_Decor_Trophy_Writs_Tier_2.description: There's no way to lose the plot when you bought it all! Rewarded for having a housing plot of a superlative size.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_01_blacksmith_.name: Kilima Wagon Wheel
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_01_blacksmith_.description: Sifuu has wall decor just like this one! She claims it's from her wagon back in the old, monster-hunting days.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_02_tumbler.name: Kilima Teacup
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_02_tumbler.description: A single terra cotta teacup. If you have any friends, you'll probably need a few more.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_03_teapot.name: Kilima Teapot
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_03_teapot.description: A terra cotta teapot with a Kilima design. Tamala probably has one just like it for nefarious purposes.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_04_paperlanter.name: Kilima Small Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_04_paperlanter.description: A lantern modeled after the ones in Kilima's town center. Kenyatta thinks they make good target practice.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_05_paperlanter.name: Kilima Large Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_05_paperlanter.description: This lantern rustles when the wind blows through it. Elouisa has mistaken it for a ghost several times.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_06_tavern_main.name: Kilima Inn Round Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_06_tavern_main.description: You know, when Ashura said you can get take-out from the inn, he probably didn't mean the dining chairs.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_07_tavern_main.name: Kilima Inn Dining Table
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_07_tavern_main.description: A table large enough for a party, and the whole town's invited! Sturdy enough to dance on.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_08_tavern_main.name: Kilima Inn Dining Chair
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_08_tavern_main.description: One of Tish's first projects in Kilima. Ashura commissioned her to design a set of custom dining chairs for the inn.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_09_tavern_main.name: Kilima Inn Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_09_tavern_main.description: A couch modeled after the one at the Ormuu's Horn. Kenli says it's his favorite because it's so soft.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_10_tavern_main.name: Kilima Inn Chezuu Game
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_10_tavern_main.description: Auni and Hassian like playing cards, but discerning minds prefer chezuu. If you can remember the rules.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_11_tavern_main.name: Kilima Inn Stool
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_11_tavern_main.description: The legs on this stool are uneven, so you have to lean on the bar and eat closer to Reth. Is this on purpose?

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_12_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Inn Large Bottle
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_12_tavern_deco.description: Did you steal this from Ashura? It's okay. He won't find out as long as Reth is doing inventory.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_13_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Wheat Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_13_tavern_deco.description: In Kilima's agrarian society, dried wheat is a popular symbol to invite a bountiful harvest.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_14_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Inn Medium Bottle
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_14_tavern_deco.description: The stopper for this bottle was lost ages ago. Some say it may have ended up in a soup.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_15_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Inn Runner
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_15_tavern_deco.description: Go on, show off your achievements! Nothing shows pride in your place like a giant runner. But is it still a runner if it fills the whole room?

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_16_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Inn Round Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_16_tavern_deco.description: Ashura says this rug is common in another Majiri society he visited, but he won't reveal more about his past.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_17_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Inn Large Rug
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_17_tavern_deco.description: One of the biggest rugs you could ever possibly buy. This one is for the Palian with room to spare who wants to share. Invite the whole town over!

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_18_tavern_deco.name: Kiliima Succulent Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_18_tavern_deco.description: Plants are a common housewarming gift in Palia. Ashura has been caring for his succulents since he arrived.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_19_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Tulip Planter
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_19_tavern_deco.description: These tulips were made for sniffing. Which villager's two lips were made for kissing?

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_20_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Small Square Frame
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_20_tavern_deco.description: Ashura hung up paintings of his friends to make the inn feel welcome. Now you can, too!

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_21_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Village Painting
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_21_tavern_deco.description: This painting shows just how nice life is in Kilima. Shining sun, green grass... Is there anything you wouldn't do to settle down here?

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_22_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Cook Portrait
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_22_tavern_deco.description: An egotistically large portrait of Kilima's bad boy, Reth, ready to break some hearts. He probably commissioned it himself.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_24_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Horn Bottle
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_24_tavern_deco.description: A small bottle that lets Reth keep soup on the go. Why does it smell like hot, soggy lettuce?

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_25_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Lantern
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_25_tavern_deco.description: Eshe attempted to standardize lighting in the Kilima town center, but only a few adopted this lantern.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_26_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Drinking Horn
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_26_tavern_deco.description: Ashura received a drinking horn on a military campaign, and it became the inspiration for his inn's name.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_27_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Fruit Basket
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_27_tavern_deco.description: A bowl of fruit always makes a great gift for your neighbors. What? Gourds are technically fruit.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_28_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Tall Painting
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_28_tavern_deco.description: Don't know what to do or where to go? Take a hint from this painting and drop on by a friend's house. You're always welcome in Kilima.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_29_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Innkeeper Portrait
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_29_tavern_deco.description: A shockingly large portrait of a slightly younger Ashura, commending him on... what? There is a strange sadness behind his kind eyes.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_30_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Farmer Portrait
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_30_tavern_deco.description: A portrait of a farmer in their fields. Badruu insists it's definitely, totally, a photo of him. He's joking...right?

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_31_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Quaint Painting
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_31_tavern_deco.description: A quaint house with a blue tiled roof. Whose is it? Doesn't matter. One day, you're going to roll up with your moving cart and get your own.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_32_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Banner
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_32_tavern_deco.description: One of Delaila's many side businesses is weaving sturdy rugs from ormuu hair. This is her most popular design.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_33_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Fireplace Tools
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_33_tavern_deco.description: These tools Sifuu crafted will keep your fireplace lit forever if you don't poke your eye, or anything else, out.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_34_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Candle
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_34_tavern_deco.description: "Bring the Inn's cozy and intimatedining experience home with a dozen of these 100% beeswax candles."

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_35_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Inn Stein
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_35_tavern_deco.description: Tish crafted these hefty steins specially for Ashura's large hands. He couldn't wash inside the smaller ones.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_36_tavern_deco.name: Kilima Large Banner
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_36_tavern_deco.description: Stand proud by displaying this official Kilima decorative banner inside or outside your home.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_37_villagecent.name: Kilima Bench
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_37_villagecent.description: These wooden, friendship, benches were designed for citizens to meet and admire Kilima's natural beauty.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_38_frogdeposit.name: Kilima Froggy Bucket
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_38_frogdeposit.description: The single most important piece of furniture in the entire world. One look into Froggy's eyes, and all your worries will wash away.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_39_harvest_fur.name: Kilima Couch
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_39_harvest_fur.description: Badruu has a whole barn for his music, but this couch is all you need for a song. Sit on down and strum away the pain.

DA_ItemType_Decor_village_41_deco_koipon.name: Kilima Koi Pond
DA_ItemType_Decor_village_41_deco_koipon.description: There's no need to be modest. Add this koi pond to your garden, and show off a bit! Stand on its small bridge for a moment of tranquility.

DA_ItemType_Decor_Bed_Cot.name: Makeshift Cot
DA_ItemType_Decor_Bed_Cot.description: This cot shakes mightily when you put any weight on it. Don't judge. It's trying its best.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Campfire.name: Campfire
DA_ItemType_Facility_Campfire.description: Start off cooking with this campfire. It turns raw ingredients into basic foods.

DA_ItemType_Facility_FabricMaker.name: Fabric Loom
DA_ItemType_Facility_FabricMaker.description: This fabric loom will convert various fibers into useful fabrics for furniture.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Garden_3x3.name: Soil
DA_ItemType_Facility_Garden_3x3.description: Place it in your yard to expand your gardening capabilities.

DA_ItemType_Facility_GlassMaker.name: Glass Furnace
DA_ItemType_Facility_GlassMaker.description: A glass furnace lets you make glass pieces like bulbs and panes for use in carpentry.

DA_ItemType_Facility_GlowWormFarm.name: Glow Worm Farm
DA_ItemType_Facility_GlowWormFarm.description: This farm filled with glow worms makes advanced fertilizer. Remember, the worms love fruit!

DA_ItemType_Facility_Mayo_Machine.name: Egg Sauce Machine
DA_ItemType_Facility_Mayo_Machine.description: A machine to make sauce out and custards out of eggs.

DA_ItemType_Facility_MixingStation.name: Mixing Station
DA_ItemType_Facility_MixingStation.description: This mixing station allows you to mix ingredients together for cooking.

DA_ItemType_Facility_ModificationBench.name: Modification Bench
DA_ItemType_Facility_ModificationBench.description: Change furniture colors and designs at this modification bench. Uses Modification Kits.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Oven.name: Standard Oven
DA_ItemType_Facility_Oven.description: This standard oven allows you to bake a wide variety of recipes from all over Palia.

DA_ItemType_Facility_PrepStation.name: Prep Station
DA_ItemType_Facility_PrepStation.description: This prep station's wide counter allows you to cut and prepare ingredients for cooking.

DA_ItemType_Facility_PreservesJar.name: Preserves Jar
DA_ItemType_Facility_PreservesJar.description: A preserves jar lets you pickle vegetables and turn fruit into jam.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Recycler.name: Recycler
DA_ItemType_Facility_Recycler.description: A machine that transform trash into useful items.

DA_ItemType_Facility_RepairStation.name: Repair Station
DA_ItemType_Facility_RepairStation.description: If your tools start to wear down, give them new life with a moment at the repair station. Uses Repair Kits.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Sawmill_Level1.name: Basic Sawmill
DA_ItemType_Facility_Sawmill_Level1.description: This basic sawmill refines wood into planks that can be used in construction.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Sawmill_Level2.name: Heavy Sawmill
DA_ItemType_Facility_Sawmill_Level2.description: This heavy sawmill refines wood into planks at a higher speed than a basic sawmill.

DA_ItemType_Facility_SeedMaker.name: Seed Collector
DA_ItemType_Facility_SeedMaker.description: This seed collector will allow you to harvest seeds from fully-grown crops.

DA_ItemType_Facility_ShippingBin.name: Shipping Bin
DA_ItemType_Facility_ShippingBin.description: A bin used to sell items.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Smelter_Level1.name: Basic Smelter
DA_ItemType_Facility_Smelter_Level1.description: This basic, stone, smelter turns mined minerals into useful forms like bricks and bars.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Smelter_Level2.name: Heavy Smelter
DA_ItemType_Facility_Smelter_Level2.description: The heavy smelter turns minerals into bricks and bars at a faster speed than the stone smelter.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Stove.name: Standard Stove
DA_ItemType_Facility_Stove.description: This standard stove allows you to cook a wide variety of recipes from all over Palia.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Well.name: Well
DA_ItemType_Facility_Well.description: A convenient location to refill your watering can.

DA_ItemType_Facility_Worktable.name: Worktable
DA_ItemType_Facility_Worktable.description: Welcome to the wonderful world of crafting! This worktable will start you off on making a wide variety of objects.

DA_ItemType_Facility_WormFarm.name: Worm Farm
DA_ItemType_Facility_WormFarm.description: Worm farms let you raise worms for fishing and helps create fertilizer.

DA_ItemType_Storage_Copper.name: Copper Storage Bin
DA_ItemType_Storage_Copper.description:
A standard general storage chest made of copper.
Stores 825 items.
You can place up to 8 general storage chests on your plot.

DA_ItemType_Storage_Iron.name: Iron Storage Bin
DA_ItemType_Storage_Iron.description:
A fine general storage chest made of iron.
Stores 1,250 items.
You can place up to 8 general storage chests on your plot.

DA_ItemType_Storage_Lockbox.name: Lockbox Storage Bin
DA_ItemType_Storage_Lockbox.description:
A special chest for secure item storage, so they will not be used for crafting. 
Stores 100 items.
You can place up to 3 lockbox storage bins on your plot.

DA_ItemType_Storage_Wooden.name: Wooden Storage Bin
DA_ItemType_Storage_Wooden.description:
A simple general storage chest made of wood.
Stores 400 items.
You can place up to 8 general storage chests on your plot.

DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_2xGrowthRate.name: SpeedyGro Fertilizer
DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_2xGrowthRate.description: Fertilizer that doubles the growth rate of crops.

DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_HarvestBooster.name: HarvestBoost Fertilizer
DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_HarvestBooster.description: Fertilizer that increases the number of crops gained on harvest.

DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_WaterRetention.name: HydratePro Fertilizer
DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_WaterRetention.description: Fertilizer that retains water in soil, preventing the need to water the next day.

DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_WeedBlocker.name: WeedBlock Fertilizer
DA_ItemType_Fertilizer_WeedBlocker.description: Fertilizer that prevents the growth of weeds.

DA_ItemType_Fish_AlbinoEel.name: Albino Eel
DA_ItemType_Fish_AlbinoEel.description:
An eel with no pigmentation.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Alligator_Gar.name: Alligator Gar
DA_ItemType_Fish_Alligator_Gar.description:
A carnivorous fish with brilliant purple scales, the Alligator Gar is named after its long snout and rows of large teeth.
Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_AncientFish.name: Ancient Fish
DA_ItemType_Fish_AncientFish.description:
An ancient fish preserved from the time of the lost human civilization.
Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms, once released from the Vault of Waves.

DA_ItemType_Fish_BahariBream.name: Bahari Bream
DA_ItemType_Fish_BahariBream.description:
These fish are widely considered to be a staple of the local diet.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Bahari_Pike.name: Bahari Pike
DA_ItemType_Fish_Bahari_Pike.description:
A pike with a deep green hue native to Bahari Bay.
Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Barracuda.name: Barracuda
DA_ItemType_Fish_Barracuda.description:
A vicious saltwater predator that tastes great lightly grilled with a little butter.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay without bait in the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_BatRay.name: Bat Ray
DA_ItemType_Fish_BatRay.description:
An ominous ray that is known to leap out of the water like a flying bat.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Beluga_Sturgeon.name: Beluga Sturgeon
DA_ItemType_Fish_Beluga_Sturgeon.description:
A large sturgeon that grows throughout its entire lifetime.
Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Bigeye_Tuna.name: Bluefin Tuna
DA_ItemType_Fish_Bigeye_Tuna.description:
A common, sleek fish adapted for swimming quickly through ocean currents.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Black_Sea_Bass.name: Black Sea Bass
DA_ItemType_Fish_Black_Sea_Bass.description:
Known for the black spots on their skin, these bass are gentle and non-threatening to Majiri and humans alike.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Blobfish.name: Blobfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Blobfish.description:
A bloated, slimy fish that lives at the bottom of cavern pools.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_BlueMarlin.name: Blue Marlin
DA_ItemType_Fish_BlueMarlin.description:
A large and resilient fish. The Blue Marlin is considered a prize by even the most experienced fishermen.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Blue_Spotted_Ray.name: Blue Spotted Ray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Blue_Spotted_Ray.description:
A colorful stringray with bright blue spots across its body and blue stripes along its tail.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using glow worms in the morning, day, and evening.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Cactus_Moray.name: Cactus Moray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Cactus_Moray.description:
An eel with sharp spines growing along its length to deter predators.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using glow worms in the day and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_CalicoKoi.name: Calico Koi
DA_ItemType_Fish_CalicoKoi.description:
A standard koi fish with a beautiful calico pattern.
Found in ponds without using any bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_CantankerousKoi.name: Cantankerous Koi
DA_ItemType_Fish_CantankerousKoi.description:
Local legend has it that the first Cantankerous Koi was a cranky old man transfigured by a wicked witch.
Found in ponds without using any bait during the day and at night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Channel_Catfish.name: Channel Catfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Channel_Catfish.description:
A river catfish at home navigating fast currents.
Found in Kilima Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Chub.name: Chub
DA_ItemType_Fish_Chub.description:
A hard-fighting fish famous for its wide ranging appetite.
Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Cloudfish.name: Cloudfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Cloudfish.description:
A bottom feeding pondfish that creates swirling clouds of sediment for cover.
Found in ponds using glow worms in the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Codfish.name: Bahari Bass
DA_ItemType_Fish_Codfish.description:
A bountiful, staple fish known for its mild flavor.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Crimson_Fangtooth.name: Crimson Fangtooth
DA_ItemType_Fish_Crimson_Fangtooth.description:
A small red fish with huge teeth in proportion to its own size.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Crucian_Carp.name: Crucian Carp
DA_ItemType_Fish_Crucian_Carp.description:
A hardy carp with coppery golden scales.
Found in Kilima rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Cutthroat_Trout.name: Cutthroat Trout
DA_ItemType_Fish_Cutthroat_Trout.description:
A river trout named after its long jaw and mouth.
Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Dawnray.name: Dawnray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Dawnray.description:
A golden ray that hunts at dawn, its scales absorbing the sun's light.
Found in Bahari Rivers without bait in the morning.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Duskray.name: Duskray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Duskray.description:
A mottled charcoal ray that hunts at dusk, blending into the riverbed.
Found in Bahari Rivers without bait in the evening.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Enchanted_Pupfish.name: Enchanted Pupfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Enchanted_Pupfish.description:
A cute little fish which can absorb trace amounts of Flow into its scales.
Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Energized_Piranha.name: Energized Piranha
DA_ItemType_Fish_Energized_Piranha.description:
A pirhana infused with magic after consuming a Grimalkin magic trinket.
Found in Kilima Rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_EyelessMinnow.name: Eyeless Minnow
DA_ItemType_Fish_EyelessMinnow.description:
A cave dwelling creature that has lost the need for eyes.
Found in Bahari Bay caves without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_FairyCarp.name: Fairy Carp
DA_ItemType_Fish_FairyCarp.description:
A shy fish with a hypnotically translucent sheen.
Found in ponds using worms in the mornings and evenings.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Fathead_Minnow.name: Fathead Minnow
DA_ItemType_Fish_Fathead_Minnow.description:
A small freshwater fish known for its oversized head.
Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Flametongue_Ray.name: Flametongue Ray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Flametongue_Ray.description:
A rare river ray named for the bright orange and red streaks across its back.
Found in Kilima rivers using glow worms in the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Fish_FreshwaterEel.name: Freshwater Eel
DA_ItemType_Fish_FreshwaterEel.description:
A long and lithe river fish often confused for a snake.
Found in Kilima Rivers using worms in the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Giant_Goldfish.name: Giant Goldfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Giant_Goldfish.description:
Against all odds, some goldfish live to become legendary in size.
Found in ponds using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Giant_Kilima_Stingray.name: Giant Kilima Stingray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Giant_Kilima_Stingray.description:
The lord of Kilima Lake, this stingray's poisonous spike can also pierce the bones of its prey.
Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms in the morning, day, and evening.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Gillyfin.name: Gillyfin
DA_ItemType_Fish_Gillyfin.description:
The most common fish in Palia.
Found in Kilima Lake without using bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_GoldenSalmon.name: Golden Salmon
DA_ItemType_Fish_GoldenSalmon.description:
A common sort of salmon known to thrive in the sunlight.
Found in Kilima Rivers using worms in the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Honey_Loach.name: Honey Loach
DA_ItemType_Fish_Honey_Loach.description:
A river fish whose yellow and black stripes resemble a honeybee.
Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms at day and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Hypnotic_Moray.name: Hypnotic Moray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Hypnotic_Moray.description:
A moray eel that combines its striking pattern and hypnotic movements to lure in prey.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Indigo_Lamprey.name: Indigo Lamprey
DA_ItemType_Fish_Indigo_Lamprey.description:
Palians in the past would harvest the scales of this fish to make a deep indigo dye.
Found in Kilima rivers using glow worms in the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Kenjis_Carp.name: Kenli's Carp
DA_ItemType_Fish_Kenjis_Carp.description:
Kenli personally discovered this carp near Kilima Village. Bears a remarkable resemblance to a Crucian Carp...
Found in Kilima rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_KilimaCatfish.name: Kilima Catfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_KilimaCatfish.description:
A unique type of catfish found only in the Kilima Valley.
Found in ponds using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Kilima_Grayling.name: Kilima Grayling
DA_ItemType_Fish_Kilima_Grayling.description:
A streamlined fish that spends the first part of its life at sea before returning to the rivers of the Kilima Valley.
Found in Kilima rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Kilima_Redfin.name: Kilima Redfin
DA_ItemType_Fish_Kilima_Redfin.description:
An aggressive river predator that will eat literally anything.
Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_LargemouthBass.name: Largemouth Bass
DA_ItemType_Fish_LargemouthBass.description:
A very talkative bass that can swallow creatures over 50% their own body weight.
Found in Kilima Lake using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Midnight_Paddlefish.name: Midnight Paddlefish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Midnight_Paddlefish.description:
A rare paddlefish that feeds at night, its dark scales keeping it hidden from predators.
Found in Kilima Lake using glow worms at night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Mirror_Carp.name: Mirror Carp
DA_ItemType_Fish_Mirror_Carp.description:
A silvery carp with scales resembling mirrors.
Found in ponds using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Mottled_Gobi.name: Mottled Gobi
DA_ItemType_Fish_Mottled_Gobi.description:
An under appreciated fish that feeds on excess pond algae.
Found in ponds using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Mudminnow.name: Mudminnow
DA_ItemType_Fish_Mudminnow.description:
A common minnow known for its muddy looking color.
Found in ponds without using any bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_MutatedAngler.name: Mutated Angler
DA_ItemType_Fish_MutatedAngler.description:
A terrifying monstrosity, said to be a survivor from the time of humans.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Oily_Anchovy.name: Oily Anchovy
DA_ItemType_Fish_Oily_Anchovy.description:
A slimy fish some Majiri find strangely appetizing.
Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Orange_Bluegill.name: Orange Bluegill
DA_ItemType_Fish_Orange_Bluegill.description:
An omnivorous fish that prefers insects but will eat anything it can fit into its mouth.
Found in ponds using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Paddlefish.name: Paddlefish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Paddlefish.description:
A primitive fish that has survived for millions of years.
Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms in the morning, day, and evening.

DA_ItemType_Fish_PaintedPerch.name: Painted Perch
DA_ItemType_Fish_PaintedPerch.description:
A petite river fish known for its pleasing colors.
Found in Kilima Lake using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Platinum_Chad.name: Platinum Chad
DA_ItemType_Fish_Platinum_Chad.description:
The brilliant platinum scales of this chad can fool fishermen into dreams of wealth.
Found in Kilima rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_PrismTrout.name: Prism Trout
DA_ItemType_Fish_PrismTrout.description:
A gorgeous trout that shines like rainbows in the sunlight.
Found in Kilima Lake using worms in the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Fish_RadiantSunfish.name: Radiant Sunfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_RadiantSunfish.description:
A beautifully radiant river fish that emits a blinding ray of light many compare to looking directly into the sun.
Found in Kilima Rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Rainbow_Trout.name: Rainbow Trout
DA_ItemType_Fish_Rainbow_Trout.description:
A river fish sporting a muted multicolor scale pattern.  Not smart enough to be jealous of the Prism Trout.
Found in Kilima Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Red-bellied_Piranha.name: Red-bellied Piranha
DA_ItemType_Fish_Red-bellied_Piranha.description:
An aggressive river predator that will eat literally anything.
Found in Kilima Rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_RibbontailRay.name: Ribbontail Ray
DA_ItemType_Fish_RibbontailRay.description:
Known to frequent tropical waters, the Ribbon Tail Ray recently made a surprising migration from the isles of Inyrevn to the west coast of the Palian Republic.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using worms in the morning and evening.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Rosy_Bitterling.name: Rosy Bitterling
DA_ItemType_Fish_Rosy_Bitterling.description:
A freshwater fish with a rosy patch on its behind.
Found in Bahari Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Sardine.name: Sardine
DA_ItemType_Fish_Sardine.description:
A small, but quick foraging fish that many Majiri enjoy eating when pickled.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Scarlet_Koi.name: Scarlet Koi
DA_ItemType_Fish_Scarlet_Koi.description:
A sleek koi fish with a deep red pattern.
Found in ponds using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Shimmerfin.name: Shimmerfin
DA_ItemType_Fish_Shimmerfin.description:
A mysterious fish that can sometimes be in two places at once.
Found in Kilima Lake using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_SilverSalmon.name: Silver Salmon
DA_ItemType_Fish_SilverSalmon.description:
A common silvery fish.
Found in Kilima Rivers without bait in evenings and nights.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Silvery_Minnow.name: Silvery Minnow
DA_ItemType_Fish_Silvery_Minnow.description:
A common minnow with silvery scales that sparkle in the sun.
Found in Bahari Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_SmallmouthBass.name: Smallmouth Bass
DA_ItemType_Fish_SmallmouthBass.description:
A common bass with very little to say that is known to occasionally leap from the water.
Found in Kilima Lake using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_SpottedBullhead.name: Spotted Bullhead
DA_ItemType_Fish_SpottedBullhead.description:
A bullhead with a spotted pattern.
Found in Kilima Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Stalking_Catfish.name: Stalking Catfish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Stalking_Catfish.description:
A predatory blue catfish that will attack nearby vulnerable fish.
Found in ponds using glow worms in the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Stickleback.name: Stickleback
DA_ItemType_Fish_Stickleback.description:
A carnivorous fish that enjoys feasting on roe, insects, crustaceans, and the toes of fisherman.
Found in Kilima Rivers using worms in the morning and day.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Stonefish.name: Stonefish
DA_ItemType_Fish_Stonefish.description:
Extremely poisonous, Stonefish naturally blend into their surroundings while waiting for prey.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Stormray.name: Stormray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Stormray.description:
A majestic river ray that hunts by twisting water currents and channeling lightning through its tail.
Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms in the morning and evening.

DA_ItemType_Fish_StripedSturgeon.name: Striped Sturgeon
DA_ItemType_Fish_StripedSturgeon.description:
A bottom feeding lake fish with light colored stripes that allow it to camouflage in the sunlight.
Found in Kilima Lake using worms in the evening and night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Striped_Dace.name: Striped Dace
DA_ItemType_Fish_Striped_Dace.description:
A dace with a striped pattern down its back.
Found in Kilima Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Swordfin_Eel.name: Swordfin Eel
DA_ItemType_Fish_Swordfin_Eel.description:
An apex predator eel that uses its own body to cut down prey.
Found in Bahari rivers using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Thundering_Eel.name: Thundering Eel
DA_ItemType_Fish_Thundering_Eel.description:
An electrically charged eel that can shock its prey into submission.
Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_UmbranCarp.name: Umbran Carp
DA_ItemType_Fish_UmbranCarp.description:
A relative of the Fairy Carp, the Umbran Carp prefers the dark environments of caves and underground lake systems.
Found in Bahari Bay caves without bait.

DA_ItemType_Fish_UnicornFish.name: Long Nosed Unicorn Fish
DA_ItemType_Fish_UnicornFish.description:
The horn of the unicorn fish is valuable to any alchemist or potion master. But beware, they are rumored to have psychic abilities that can make even the most accomplished fisherman think left is right.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using glow worms during the day.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Voidray.name: Void Ray
DA_ItemType_Fish_Voidray.description:
Alien and terrifying, some say the Voidray can enter the Echo realm and feed off smaller echoes it finds.
Found in Bahari Bay caves using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Willow_Lamprey.name: Willow Lamprey
DA_ItemType_Fish_Willow_Lamprey.description:
A long, thin lamprey named after its similarity to the branches of a willow tree.
Found in Bahari Bay rivers using worms at night.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Yellowfin_Tuna.name: Yellowfin Tuna
DA_ItemType_Fish_Yellowfin_Tuna.description:
A large tuna that can swim faster than its size implies.
Found off the coast of Bahari Bay using glow worms.

DA_ItemType_Fish_Yellow_Perch.name: Yellow Perch
DA_ItemType_Fish_Yellow_Perch.description:
A common perch found in rivers.
Found in Bahari Rivers without bait.

DA_ItemType_Trash_ShipFragments.name: Ship Fragments
DA_ItemType_Trash_ShipFragments.description: A common piece of garbage found in the ocean. Evidence of a recent shipwreck.

DA_ItemType_Trash_WagonWheel.name: Wagon Wheel
DA_ItemType_Trash_WagonWheel.description: A common piece of garbage found in and around Crystal Lake. Perhaps a relic from travelers passing through.

DA_ItemType_Trash_WaterloggedBoot.name: Waterlogged Boot
DA_ItemType_Trash_WaterloggedBoot.description: A common piece of garbage found in Mirror Pond.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Beach_Coral.name: Coral
DA_ItemType_Forage_Beach_Coral.description: Bring the beach home with you with this piece of coral. You can almost smell the reef!

DA_ItemType_Forage_Beach_Oyster.name: Unopened Oyster
DA_ItemType_Forage_Beach_Oyster.description: Open up this oyster! Even if you don't find a pearl, you can at least eat it.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Beach_Shell.name: Shell
DA_ItemType_Forage_Beach_Shell.description: Who sells sea shells by the sea shore? No one. You had to find this yourself.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Crop_Honey.name: Honey
DA_ItemType_Forage_Crop_Honey.description: Honey is a sweetener that can be eaten raw or cooked. You won't bee-lieve how good it is!

DA_ItemType_Forage_Crystal_Pearl.name: Pearl
DA_ItemType_Forage_Crystal_Pearl.description: Here's a pearl of wisdom: open more oysters for a chance at other colors of pearls!

DA_ItemType_Forage_Crystal_Pearl_Green.name: Green Pearl
DA_ItemType_Forage_Crystal_Pearl_Green.description: Holy mother of Green Pearl! You actually found one!

DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_BriarDaisy.name: Briar Daisy
DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_BriarDaisy.description: The mountainous Briar Daisy can survive even the harshest conditions.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_CrystalLakeLot.name: Crystal Lake Lotus
DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_CrystalLakeLot.description: The Crystal Lake Lotus is named after where it was discovered and is now used to make dyes.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_HeartDropLily.name: Heartdrop Lily
DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_HeartDropLily.description: The Heartdrop Lily is a rare flower with a special meaning to Palians: the blossoming of romantic love.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_SundropLily.name: Sundrop Lily
DA_ItemType_Forage_Flower_SundropLily.description: The Sundrop Lily grows in open fields where it can turn its petals to the sunlight.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Material_Firestone.name: Phoenix Tear
DA_ItemType_Forage_Material_Firestone.description: Occasionally, pieces of the Human moon, Ignis, fall from the sky. These rocks are called Phoenix Tears.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Material_HeartOfMagic.name: Crystallized Flow
DA_ItemType_Forage_Material_HeartOfMagic.description: Crystallized Flow is created when a critical mass of Flow coalesces in the same location.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Material_Moonstone.name: Moonstone
DA_ItemType_Forage_Material_Moonstone.description: Every alchemist longs to one day behold a Moonstone, a rock broken off from Luna itself.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Meat_Oyster.name: Oyster Meat
DA_ItemType_Forage_Meat_Oyster.description: Oyster meat can be slurped on a half-shell or cooked into a variety of seafood dishes.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Moss_DragonsBeard.name: Dragon's Beard Peat
DA_ItemType_Forage_Moss_DragonsBeard.description: Dragon's Beard Peat is a rare, alchemical, moss named for its color, which resembles Maji's.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Moss_EmeraldCarpet.name: Emerald Carpet Moss
DA_ItemType_Forage_Moss_EmeraldCarpet.description: Filling your home with the bright color of Emerald Carpet Moss is said to bring good luck.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Mushroom_Brightshroom.name: Brightshroom
DA_ItemType_Forage_Mushroom_Brightshroom.description: Brightshrooms get their glow from absorbing Flow and thus have many alchemical uses.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Mushroom_Cave.name: Mountain Morel
DA_ItemType_Forage_Mushroom_Cave.description: A common mushroom, Mountain Morels can be found right at home! Super popular, raw or cooked.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_DariCloves.name: Dari Cloves
DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_DariCloves.description: The rare Dari Clove is a spice loved by chefs and alchemists alike. Said to have magical properties.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_HeatRoot.name: Heat Root
DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_HeatRoot.description: Don't sweat it! Whether it's cooking or healing, spicy Heat Root will warm you up from the inside out.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_SpiceSprout.name: Spice Sprouts
DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_SpiceSprout.description: Spice Sprouts will lend a rich color and earthy flavor to any dish. And they're pretty easy to find, too..

DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_SweetLeaves.name: Sweet Leaf
DA_ItemType_Forage_Spice_SweetLeaves.description: Those with sweet teeth will love this Sweet Leaf, one of Palia's favorite dessert ingredients.

DA_ItemType_Forage_Vegetable_Garlic.name: Wild Garlic
DA_ItemType_Forage_Vegetable_Garlic.description: Garlic is a delicious addition to any dish you cook! Or can be eaten raw to perfume one's breath.

DA_ItemType_Bobber_Exquisite.name: Exquisite Bobber
DA_ItemType_Bobber_Exquisite.description: Changes your fishing bobber to the one from the Exquisite Rod.

DA_ItemType_Bobber_Fine.name: Fine Bobber
DA_ItemType_Bobber_Fine.description: Changes your fishing bobber to the one from the Fine Rod.

DA_ItemType_Bobber_Lantern.name: Lantern Bobber
DA_ItemType_Bobber_Lantern.description: Changes your fishing bobber to a festive lantern.

DA_ItemType_Bobber_Simple.name: Basic Bobber
DA_ItemType_Bobber_Simple.description: Changes your fishing bobber to the one from the Makeshift Rod.

DA_ItemType_Bobber_Standard.name: Standard Bobber
DA_ItemType_Bobber_Standard.description: Changes your fishing bobber to the one from the Standard Rod.

DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_HookTime.name: Major Hook Time Booster
DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_HookTime.description: Significantly decreases time to hook a fish when equipped.

DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_RodHealth.name: Minor Rod Health Booster
DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_RodHealth.description: Slighty increases fishing rod health when equipped.

DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_RodRecovery.description: Significantly increases fishing rod health recovery rate when equipped.

DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_SafeZoneSize.name: Major Safe Zone Size Booster
DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_SafeZoneSize.description: Significantly increases fishing safe zone size when equipped.

DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_SafeZoneSpeed.name: Major Safe Zone Speed Booster
DA_ItemType_FishingAttach_SafeZoneSpeed.description: Significantly increases fishing safe zone speed when equipped.

DA_ItemType_Glider_HotPink.name: Hot Pink Glider
DA_ItemType_Glider_HotPink.description: Tap the jump button while falling to glide. Your glider must be equipped in the Accessories slot.

DA_ItemType_Glider_Simple.name: Glider
DA_ItemType_Glider_Simple.description: Tap the jump button while falling to glide. Your glider must be equipped in the Accessories slot.

DA_ItemType_Shield_Simple.name: Simple Shield
DA_ItemType_Shield_Simple.description: Use right-click to block while using a sword.

DA_ItemType_LootCrate_Large.description: An empty loot crate from your travels.

DA_ItemType_Building_Gazebo.description: A gazebo placable on the housing plot.

DA_ItemType_Building_WaterTower.description: A water tower placable on the housing plot.

DA_ItemType_Building_Windmill.description: A windmill placable on the housing plot.

DA_ItemType_Doorway_3_Single.name: Kilima Door
DA_ItemType_Doorway_3_Single.description: If your eyes are the window to your soul, then a door is the mouth to your house.

DA_ItemType_FoliageOnPlot_Rock.description: [Internal Use Only] A rock on a housing plot.

DA_ItemType_FoliageOnPlot_TreeBirch_M.description: [Internal Use Only] A tree on a housing plot.

DA_ItemType_FoliageOnPlot_TreeOak_M.name: Foliage Tree Oak M
DA_ItemType_FoliageOnPlot_TreeOak_M.description: [Internal Use Only] A tree on a housing plot.

DA_ItemType_House_11.description: A nice 11x11 meter room. Takes 8 hours to build.

DA_ItemType_House_3.description: A 3x3 Hallway section. Takes 8 hours to build.

DA_ItemType_House_7.name: Small Room
DA_ItemType_House_7.description: A nice 7x7 meter room. Takes 8 hours to build.

DA_ItemType_House_9.name: Medium Room
DA_ItemType_House_9.description: A nice 9x9 meter room. Takes 8 hours to build.

DA_ItemType_House_Main.name: Harvest House
DA_ItemType_House_Main.description: The main entrance to your home. 11x11 meters in size. Takes 8 hours to build.

DA_ItemType_Housing_Writ.name: Writ
DA_ItemType_Housing_Writ.description: A writ that allows you to expand your housing space.

DA_ItemType_Porch_3.name: Kilima Porch
DA_ItemType_Porch_3.description: If you think about it, a porch is simply a room without walls. Albeit, this one's about the size of a closet.

DA_ItemType_Sunroom_3.name: Hallway Section
DA_ItemType_Sunroom_3.description: A 3x3 Hallway section. Takes 8 hours to build.

DA_ItemType_Tent_Small.name: Makeshift Tent
DA_ItemType_Tent_Small.description: A small tent to get you started.

DA_ItemType_House_3wCloset.name: Blueprint: Walk-In Closet
DA_ItemType_House_3wCloset.description: A walk-in closet for changing your clothes.

DA_ItemType_ChapaaChase_KenliChapaa.name: Kenli's Chapaa
DA_ItemType_ChapaaChase_KenliChapaa.description: One of Kenli's escaped chapaa's, get 'em home!

DA_ItemType_Material_Antler_T1.name: Sernuk Antlers
DA_ItemType_Material_Antler_T1.description: The antlers of a sernuk. Often used for decoration and in medicine.

DA_ItemType_Material_Antler_T2.name: Elder Sernuk Antlers
DA_ItemType_Material_Antler_T2.description: The antlers of an elder sernuk. Often used for decoration and in medicine.

DA_ItemType_Material_Antler_T3.name: Proudhorned Sernuk Antlers
DA_ItemType_Material_Antler_T3.description: The antlers of a rare, Proudhorned Sernuk. Prized for decoration and in medicine.

DA_ItemType_Material_Fabric.name: Fabric
DA_ItemType_Material_Fabric.description: A hardy sheet of cotton fabric.

DA_ItemType_Material_Fur.name: Chapaa Fur
DA_ItemType_Material_Fur.description: The fluffy fur of a wild chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Material_Hide.name: Sernuk Hide
DA_ItemType_Material_Hide.description: A strong hide from a wild sernuk.

DA_ItemType_Material_Leather.name: Leather
DA_ItemType_Material_Leather.description: A sernuk hide that has been tanned into smooth leather.

DA_ItemType_Material_Silk.name: Silk
DA_ItemType_Material_Silk.description: A smooth sheet of silk woven from raw thread.

DA_ItemType_Material_Tail_T1.name: Spotted Chapaa Tail
DA_ItemType_Material_Tail_T1.description: The spotted tail of a chapaa. Often praised for its soft fur.

DA_ItemType_Material_Tail_T2.name: Striped Chapaa Tail
DA_ItemType_Material_Tail_T2.description: The striped tail of a striped chapaa. Often praised for its soft fur.

DA_ItemType_Material_Tail_T3.name: Azure Chapaa Tail
DA_ItemType_Material_Tail_T3.description: The gleaming tail of a rare azure chapaa. Often praised for its silken fur.

DA_ItemType_Material_Witchweave.name: Witchweave
DA_ItemType_Material_Witchweave.description: A wondrous fabric of an alchemist's creation.

DA_ItemType_Trash_Hide_Scraps.name: Hide Scraps
DA_ItemType_Trash_Hide_Scraps.description: Leftover scraps that can be recycled

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Copper.name: Copper Bar
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Copper.description: This refined copper passes the bar. Used to craft a variety of standard items.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Gold.name: Gold Bar
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Gold.description: Thanks a bullion for this gold bar! Sells for a very high price.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Iron.name: Iron Bar
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Iron.description: Isn't this ironic? It's an iron bar! Used to craft a variety of fine items.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Palium.name: Palium Bar
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Palium.description: Refined palium sets the bar for metals. Used to craft a variety of exquisite items.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Platinum.name: Platinum Bar
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Platinum.description: This bar is setting a platinum record. Sells for an extremely high price.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Silver.name: Silver Bar
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Bar_Silver.description: Silverware? Here! It's a silver bar! Sells for a high price.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Brick_Stone.name: Stone Brick
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Brick_Stone.description: This stone brick is sure to rock you! Can be used in crafting or house building.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ceramic.name: Ceramic
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ceramic.description: Wouldn't you kiln to have ceramic like this? Can be used in crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Glass_Bulb.name: Glass Bulb
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Glass_Bulb.description: A light bulb? What a great idea! Can be used in crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Glass_Pane.name: Glass Pane
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Glass_Pane.description: You can see clearly now thanks to this glass pane. Can be used in crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Copper.name: Copper Ore
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Copper.description: A rock that contains copper. Can be smelted into bars for crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Gold.name: Gold Ore
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Gold.description: A rock that contains gold. Can be smelted into bars for sale.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Iron.name: Iron Ore
DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Iron.description: A rock that contains iron. Can be smelted into bars for crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Palium.description: A rock that contains palium. Can be smelted into bars for crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Platinum.description: A rock that contains platinum. Can be smelted into bars for sale.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Ore_Silver.description: A rock that contains silver. Can be smelted into bars for sale.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Rock_Clay.description: An earthen material. Can be smelted into ceramic for crafting.

DA_ItemType_Mineral_Rock_Stone.description: A common stone. Can be smelted into bricks.

DA_ItemType_Trash_Chipped_Gemstone.description: Ruined gemstone that can be recycled

DA_ItemType_LuckyTicket.description: Use at Zeki's machine to get an unexpected reward!

DA_ItemType_Reward_ChapaaChaseTicket.name: Chapaa Chase Ticket
DA_ItemType_Reward_ChapaaChaseTicket.description: Earned by playing Chapaa Chase at the Maji Market.

DA_ItemType_Reward_ChapaaChaseTicket_100.description: Earned by playing Chapaa Chase at the Maji Market.

DA_ItemType_Reward_ChapaaChaseTicket_300.description: Earned by playing Chapaa Chase at the Maji Market.

DA_ItemType_Trash_Broken_Pan.description: A broken pan that could be recycled into something useful

DA_ItemType_Trash_Discard_Newspaper.description: Lump of old newspaper that can be recycled

DA_ItemType_Trash_Muddy_Container.description: A muddy container that can be recycled

DA_ItemType_Product_Butter.description: Can't believe it's definitely butter? Well, nuthin's better!

DA_ItemType_Product_Cheese.name: Cheese
DA_ItemType_Product_Cheese.description: Don't worry if the milk goes bad. Relax and take it cheese-y!

DA_ItemType_Product_CookingOil.name: Cooking Oil
DA_ItemType_Product_CookingOil.description: If you need perfectly browned food, oil always be here for you.

DA_ItemType_Product_Egg.description: A peki egg makes every morning egg-cellent!

DA_ItemType_Product_Flour.name: Flour
DA_ItemType_Product_Flour.description: When baking, dough not forget to use plenty of flour.

DA_ItemType_Product_Jam_Apple.description: Be the apple of someone's eye with a gift of sweet apple jam. Or just eat it yourself.

DA_ItemType_Product_Jam_Blueberry.description: Why scream until you're blue in the face when you can just make sweet blueberry jam?

DA_ItemType_Product_Jelly.description: Don't be jealous of this jelly! It just wants you to like it.

DA_ItemType_Product_Meat_Cearnuk.description: The savory meat of a wild sernuk.

DA_ItemType_Product_Meat_Chapaa.description: The tender meat of a wild chapaa.

DA_ItemType_Product_Pickle.description: You'll never find yourself in a pickle with these dill-icious pickles!

DA_ItemType_Product_Pickle_Carrot.description: Making pickled carrots? Remember to peel them first! Unless you like the taste of dirt.

DA_ItemType_Product_Pickle_Onion.description: Pickled onions go great on any dish, and no one can tell you're crying when you make 'em!

DA_ItemType_Product_Pickle_Potato.description: Cast off your dinenrtime woes by cracking open a jar of pickled potatoes!

DA_ItemType_Product_Pickle_Tomato.description: When you think about it, pickled tomatoes are just a very acidic, deconstructed, pasta sauce.

DA_ItemType_Product_Salt.description: No need to be salty. You only need a pinch to add flavor to your food.

DA_ItemType_Product_Sugar.name: Sugar
DA_ItemType_Product_Sugar.description: Sweeten your life with a spoonful of sugar. Quite popular with children.

DA_ItemType_Product_Vinegar.name: Vinegar
DA_ItemType_Product_Vinegar.description: Vinegar's sharp taste gives foods a kick. Some people drink it straight.

DA_ItemType_Assistance_HouseGuarantor.description: Written proof that a house exists

DA_ItemType_ChaynesTelescope.description: The flattest fish you've caught so far. Einar probably wants to know what kind of bait you used.

DA_ItemType_CleanBall.description: A well-loved toy ball with visible Plumehound-sized bite marks all over it. Glitters like stars under direct sunlight.
