Can mine Iron.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Repair_Kit.name: Repair Kit
DA_ItemType_Tool_Repair_Kit.description: Use these repair kits with the Repair Station to fix your tools.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Rod_Exquisite.name: Exquisite Rod
DA_ItemType_Tool_Rod_Exquisite.description:
An exquisite rod for fishing. 
Moves faster than the Fine Rod.
Has more line health than the Fine Rod.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Rod_Fine.name: Fine Rod
DA_ItemType_Tool_Rod_Fine.description:
A fine rod for fishing. 
Moves faster than the Standard Rod.
Has more line health than the Standard Rod.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Rod_Standard.name: Standard Rod
DA_ItemType_Tool_Rod_Standard.description:
A standard rod for fishing. 
Moves faster than the Makeshift Rod.
Has more line health than the Makeshift Rod.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Exquisite.name: Palium Sword & Shield
DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Exquisite.description: An exquisite sword and shield for combat.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Fine.name: Iron Sword & Shield
DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Fine.description: A fine sword and shield for combat.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Simple.name: Makeshift Sword & Shield
DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Simple.description: A starter sword and shield for combat.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Standard.name: Copper Sword & Shield
DA_ItemType_Tool_Sword_Standard.description: A standard sword and shield for combat.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Upgrade1.name: Standard Tool Kit
DA_ItemType_Tool_Upgrade1.description: Upgrade your starter tools with this tool kit.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Upgrade2.name: Fine Tool Kit
DA_ItemType_Tool_Upgrade2.description: Upgrade your standard tools with this tool kit.

DA_ItemType_Tool_Upgrade3.name: Exquisite Tool Kit
DA_ItemType_Tool_Upgrade3.description: Upgrade your fine tools with this tool kit.

DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Exquisite.name: Exquisite Watering Can
DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Exquisite.description:
An exquisite watering can for gardening. 
Holds more water than the Fine Can.
Waters up to nine crops at once faster than the Fine Can.

DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Fine.name: Fine Watering Can
DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Fine.description:
A fine watering can for gardening. 
Holds more water than the Standard Can.
Waters up to nine crops at once.

DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Simple.name: Makeshift Watering Can
DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Simple.description: A starter watering can for gardening.

DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Standard.name: Standard Watering Can
DA_ItemType_Tool_WateringCan_Standard.description:
A standard watering can for gardening. 
Holds more water than the Makeshift Can.
Waters up to five crops at once.

DA_ItemType_CraftingLicense.name: Crafting License
DA_ItemType_CraftingLicense.description: Increases the number of crafters you can place by 1.

DA_ItemType_Flooring_BlockFloor.name: Basketweave Wood Floor
DA_ItemType_Flooring_BlockFloor.description: If you're kind of a square, maybe you'll like this flooring where planks are laid out in a basketweave pattern.

DA_ItemType_Flooring_HarvestFloor.name: Horizontal Wood Floor
DA_ItemType_Flooring_HarvestFloor.description: Basic wooden flooring that is excellent for sliding on in socks. Or very, very, sweaty bare feet.

DA_ItemType_Flooring_MarbleTiles.name: City Hall Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Flooring_MarbleTiles.description: Marble tiles just like the ones in Kilima City Hall. But how do they keep theirs so clean?

DA_ItemType_Flooring_StoneTiles.name: Apothecary Stone Floor
DA_ItemType_Flooring_StoneTiles.description: This natural stone flooring stays cool in the heat of summer. But you might want slippers during cooler months.

DA_ItemType_Flooring_VillageWood.name: Reclaimed Wood Floor
DA_ItemType_Flooring_VillageWood.description: Waste not with this flooring of reclaimed wood. Just be wary of splinters. At least it's inexpensive.

DA_ItemType_Flooring_WoodTiles.name: Library Parquet Floor
DA_ItemType_Flooring_WoodTiles.description: Multiple types of wood are used to make this flooring's pattern, which is inspired by the Kilima town library.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Ceramic_Tiles_Chic_01.name: Gold Manor Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Ceramic_Tiles_Chic_01.description: This marble and gold tile will make your floor into rival the capital palaces even if the rest of your house doesn't.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Ceramic_Tiles_Chic_02.name: Copper Manor Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Ceramic_Tiles_Chic_02.description: Warm up your toes on a sunny day with a quick dance across these chic copper tiles.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Ceramic_Tiles_Chic_03.name: Iron Manor Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Ceramic_Tiles_Chic_03.description: These iron tiles will keep your floor cool, not just in temperature but also in style.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Floral_Stone_Tile_01.name: Blue Madder Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Floral_Stone_Tile_01.description: The floral design on these stone tiles will make you feel like you're living in a country cottage.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Floral_Stone_Tile_02.name: Rose Madder Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Floral_Stone_Tile_02.description: The flower that inspired the design of this stone tile was also used to give its glaze it a unique, rosy finish.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Floral_Stone_Tile_03.name: Field Madder Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Floral_Stone_Tile_03.description: Walking across this tile feels just like walking through a field of flowers! But with less dirt.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Hex_stones_tile_01.name: Sienna Cubed Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Hex_stones_tile_01.description: Test your guests' perception with this optical illusion floor. Is it diamond tiles or cube tiles?

DA_ItemType_Floor_Hex_stones_tile_02.name: Ochre Cubed Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Hex_stones_tile_02.description: These diamond tiles create a hexagonal grid, so you can play your favorite isometric games on the floor!

DA_ItemType_Floor_Hex_stones_tile_03.name: Honeybunch Cubed Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Hex_stones_tile_03.description: Subtly express your love for bees with this warm, honeycomb-inspired tile pattern.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Large_Copper_Tiles_01.name: Brass Brick Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Large_Copper_Tiles_01.description: Usually bricks are made of stone, but these are made of brass. How intriguing!

DA_ItemType_Floor_Large_Copper_Tiles_02.name: Copper Brick Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Large_Copper_Tiles_02.description: This copper floor is unbearably hot in the summer and agonizingly cold in the winter. But hey, it's super durable.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Large_Copper_Tiles_03.name: Verdigris Brick Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Large_Copper_Tiles_03.description: These bricks are made from a mysterious metal with a subtle, colored hue. Where was it mined?

DA_ItemType_Floor_Majiri_Tiles_01.name: Sunny Majiri Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Majiri_Tiles_01.description: These ceramic tiles are decorated with popular Majiri symbols. But what do they even mean?

DA_ItemType_Floor_Majiri_Tiles_02.name: Foggy Majiri Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Majiri_Tiles_02.description: The symbols on these tiles could be a secret, ancient language! Or they might just be Majiri decoration.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Small_Copper_Tiles_01.name: Brass Furnace Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Small_Copper_Tiles_01.description: These tough tiles can take a beating from any kind of shoe. Note, non-shoe items like jackhammers void warranty.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Small_Copper_Tiles_02.name: Iron Furnace Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Small_Copper_Tiles_02.description: These tiles are designed to withstand the harshest industrial conditions, and that includes your house.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Stone_Tiles_01.name: Sandstone Swirl Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Stone_Tiles_01.description: Feel the heat with these tiles made from rare, sedimentary rock mined in a faraway desert.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Stone_Tiles_02.name: Slate Swirl Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Stone_Tiles_02.description: Feeling kind of exhausted? Simply collapse onto this cool, slate floor. It won't judge. Promise.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Swirly_Tiles_01.name: Golden Ripple Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Swirly_Tiles_01.description: Get lost in the soothing waves of this psychedelic floor pattern. It's like the ocean, but shinier!

DA_ItemType_Floor_Swirly_Tiles_02.name: Copper Ripple Tile Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Swirly_Tiles_02.description: This floor's design resembles warm waves of flowing lava, but it's far less deadly.

DA_ItemType_Floor_Woode_and_Stone_Tile.name: Hexagonal Mixed Floor
DA_ItemType_Floor_Woode_and_Stone_Tile.description: Can't decide between wood or tile? This flooring incorporates both in an innovative, hexagonal pattern.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_BambooFor.name: Bamboo Grove Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_BambooFor.description: Surround yourself with swaying bamboo, and since it's wallpaper, you can't actually get lost in the forest!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_DragonMou.name: Kilima Mountain Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_DragonMou.description: Turn your house into a mountain cabin with this wallpaper where mist clouds move around granite peaks.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Sakura.name: Windy Wisteria Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Sakura.description: Enjoy all the falling petals without any of the cleanup by pasting up this wisteria garden wallpaper.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Seaview.name: Sea to Sky Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Seaview.description: Soothing waves crest and clouds move across the sky in this wallpaper. You'll feel you have no walls at all!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Bu.name: Butterfly Lights Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Bu.description: Perfect for the master bug catcher, this wallpaper is covered in butterflies to light up the night. But wouldn't that make them moths or fireflies?

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Co.name: Ramen Bowl Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Co.description: An experienced chef never forgets the ingredients for any dish, even one as complex as ramen. But if you do, this wallpaper is a helpful reminder.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Fi.name: Under the Sea Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Fi.description: Show off your fishing expertise with this aquatic wallpaper. Experience all the beauty of the ocean with zero risk of drowning.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Fo.name: Mushroom Woods Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Fo.description: A master forager goes out to gather rain or shine, but this bright wallpaper lets you enjoy the spirit of the forest in any weather.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Fu.name: Blueprint Board Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Fu.description: It takes a lot of blueprints to become a master furniture maker. To impress your friends, you should hang them all up. Every. Single. One.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Ga.name: Tomato Vines Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Ga.description: Every expert gardener loves watching vines grow. This wallpaper lets you observe your crops indoors or out. As long as you plant tomatoes.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Hu.name: Sernuk Run Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Hu.description: Only expert hunters can hang this sylvan wallpaper up in their homes. Alas those poor sernuks are still on the run, even indoors.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Mi.name: Furnace Parts Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Animated_Skills_Mi.description: A master miner's house is never too cold. Heat up your hearth with the warm lights of this furnace-inspired wallpaper.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Apothecary.name: Stained Wood Paneling
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Apothecary.description: Make your siding more exciting with a bit of paint. That way no one can tell what wood you used.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Bathroom_Tiles_01.name: Moss Listello Tile Wall
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Bathroom_Tiles_01.description: You'll feel like you're on a winding, mossy, path with this tile border winding around your room,

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Bathroom_Tiles_02.name: Lichen Listello Tile Wall
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Bathroom_Tiles_02.description: If you need more mountain-inspired designs, you can certainly liken this tile border to lichen.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Blacksmith.name: Ormuu's Horn Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Blacksmith.description: If you can't get enough of the Ormuu's Horn, you can at least copy Ashura's taste in wallpaper.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Cityhall.name: Bahari Estate Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Cityhall.description: A time-honored pattern that can be found on the Bahari family properties. You, too, can feel like a magistrate!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Cross.name: I'm Rather Cross Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Cross.description: An eye-catching wallpaper with a geometric pattern. It might leave you seeing cross-eyed.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Crown_Molding_2_01.name: Marble Wainscotting
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Crown_Molding_2_01.description: If a marble wall is too expensive, install marble wainscotting. Then you only need to do half.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Crown_Molding_2_02.name: Slate Wainscotting
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Crown_Molding_2_02.description: Slate wainscotting not only looks great, it protects your wall from scratches. But only the bottom half.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Default.name: Surface Remover
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Default.description: Removes any applied wallpaper or flooring, returning the surface to its original look.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Old_Plank.name: Cooling Rustic Siding
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Old_Plank.description: If your house feels too warm, just paint it in cool colors. That's how color temperature works, right?

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Old_Plank.name: Blushing Rustic Siding
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Old_Plank.description: This hardy siding is so very happy to see you, it's practically blushing! Bring it home today!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Stone_01.name: Gypsum Flagstone Wall
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Stone_01.description: These flagstones were definitely specifically cut for this wall and not just broken pieces of a failed statue.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Stone_02.name: Carbon Flagstone Wall
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Exterior_Stone_02.description: The volcanic ash in the mortar of this flagstone wall will give your house an authentic death metal feel.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_GeneralStore.name: Zeki's General Store Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_GeneralStore.description: For the innovators out there who like Grimalkin technology and aesthetics. Use the same wallpaper as Zeki!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Harvest.name: Country Comforts Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Harvest.description: The farmhouse-style trim gives this wallpaper a feeling warm as apple pie in winter.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.name: Pastoral Beadboard
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.description: Add idyllic charm to your room with wood panels that have been painted to match the colors of the countryside.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.name: Umbral Beadboard
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.description: Add brooding gloom to your room with wood panels that have been painted to match the shadows of your soul.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.name: Glacial Beadboard
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.description: Add icy brightness to your room with wood panels that have been painted to match the light of the arctic.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.name: Nautical Beadboard
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Mid_Wall_Crown_Mol.description: Add seaworthy sophistication to your room with wood panels that have been painted to match the deep ocean.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_01.name: Waves of Water Windows
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_01.description: The architect of these stained glass windows made them for a friend who loved the ocean but couldn't swim.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_02.name: Waves of Wheat Windows
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_02.description: Experience a bountiful harvest year-round with these stained-glass windows inspired by golden wheat.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_Wave.name: Waves of Water Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_Wave.description: Don't be scared of this watery wallpaper. This wave of waves just wants to wave hello!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_Wave.name: Waves of Wheat Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Stained_Glass_Wave.description: Don't stare too long at this harvest-inspired wallpaper, or you may end up craving pasta. Mm, carbs.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Starry_Night_2_01.name: Starry Night Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Starry_Night_2_01.description: Play connect-the-dots with this starry wallpaper and create your own, new constellations!

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Starry_Night_2_02.name: Starry Evening Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Starry_Night_2_02.description: This lovely wallpaper matches the starry sky outside. For approximately one hour in the evening. If it's clear.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Starry_Night_2_03.name: Starry Sea Wallpaper
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Starry_Night_2_03.description: Was this wallpaper inspired by stars reflecting off the sea? Or did the artist just paint really big water sparkles?

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Tavern.name: Natural Wood Paneling
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_Tavern.description: Behind every wall is a series of wooden planks. So classic that you don't even need wallpaper.

DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_WallTile.name: A Little Jaded Tile Wall
DA_ItemType_Wallpaper_WallTile.description: Tile your wall with translucent stone. Hopefully you won't get bored of seeing them everywhere.

DA_ItemType_Trash_Scrap_Wood.name: Scrap Wood
DA_ItemType_Trash_Scrap_Wood.description: A bit of scrap wood that can be recycled.

DA_ItemType_Wood_Hardwood.name: Heartwood
DA_ItemType_Wood_Hardwood.description: Harder, raw, lumber cut right from a tree.

DA_ItemType_Wood_Magicwood.name: Flow-Infused Wood
DA_ItemType_Wood_Magicwood.description: Flow-infused, sapwood lumber cut right from a tree.

DA_ItemType_Wood_Plank_Hardwood.name: Heartwood Plank
DA_ItemType_Wood_Plank_Hardwood.description: Cut and sanded, harder, heartwood used in building.

DA_ItemType_Wood_Plank_Magicwood.name: Flow-Infused Plank
DA_ItemType_Wood_Plank_Magicwood.description: Cut and sanded, Flow-infused, sapwood used in building.

DA_ItemType_Wood_Plank_Softwood.name: Sapwood Plank
DA_ItemType_Wood_Plank_Softwood.description: Cut and sanded, soft, sapwood used in building.

DA_ItemType_Wood_Softwood.name: Sapwood
DA_ItemType_Wood_Softwood.description: Soft, raw, lumber cut right from a tree.
